  • FLAMENGO VS. AL HILAL - FOOTBALL MATCH REPORT - FEBRUARY 7, 2023

    https://www.espn.co.uk/football/report/_/gameId/664847

    02/08/2023, 06:05

    85.0% Shortened!

    Saudi Arabia's Al Hilal stunned 10-man Flamengo to reach Club World Cup final with a 3-2 victory on Tuesday thanks to two penalties from Salem Al Dawsari and a close-range strike from Luciano Vietto

    Al Hilal, the first Saudi side to reach the Club World Cup final, will face the winners of Real Madrid's semifinal against Al Ahly on Wednesday in Rabat

    The referee did not fall for it and showed a yellow card to the Flamengo midfielder for simulation

    Flamengo, desperate to avoid becoming only the fourth Brazilian side to lose a Club World Cup semifinal, lost their cool and were shown four yellow cards in the first half

    More Details There will be no dream final against Real Madrid for Flamengo at the Club World Cup, as the mighty Brazilian side collapsed under pressure

    Saudi Arabia's Al Hilal stunned South American champions Flamengo to reach Club World Cup final with a 3-2 victory on Tuesday

    ['hilal', 'flamengo', 'club', 'world', 'cup']

    Saudi Arabia's Al Hilal stunned 10-man Flamengo to reach Club World Cup final with a 3-2 victory on Tuesday thanks to two penalties from Salem Al Dawsari and a close-range strike from Luciano Vietto

    Al Hilal, the first Saudi side to reach the Club World Cup final, will face the winners of Real Madrid's semifinal against Al Ahly on Wednesday in Rabat

    The referee did not fall for it and showed a yellow card to the Flamengo midfielder for simulation

    Flamengo, desperate to avoid becoming only the fourth Brazilian side to lose a Club World Cup semifinal, lost their cool and were shown four yellow cards in the first half

    More Details There will be no dream final against Real Madrid for Flamengo at the Club World Cup, as the mighty Brazilian side collapsed under pressure

    BUT NOT AS YOU KNOW IT Manchester United are yet to make a decision over their priority transfer target this summer with Erik ten Hag set to choose between Harry Kane or Victor Osimhen, according to reports

    The Telegraph reports that Kane and Osimhen are the two players who currently top United’s shortlist, while Ten Hag is still determining which striker would work best in his system at Old Trafford

    The report claims that Ten Hag has been keeping tabs on Osimhen’s performances for Napoli since the start of the season but is ‘unsure’ over some parts of the 24-year-old’s game

    Meanwhile, it’s claimed that Ten Hag understands that Kane offers a ‘unique skillset’ and would be a ‘strong character’ at United

    However, both Kane and Osimhen are likely to cost United at least £100 million this summer but the Nigeria international would offer Ten Hag a longer-term solution if he proves to be a success

    Napoli would also command in excess of £100m for Osimhen, who is the top scorer in Serie A this season with 16 goals for Napoli

    ['united', 'ten', 'hag', 'kane', 'osimhen']

    You file a joint return, and you and your spouse have a combined income of more than $44,000

    This is your Social Security Benefit Statement, or SSA-1099, and can be used to figure out how much you owe when you are filing your federal tax return

    LIC holds a 4.23% stake in the flagship Adani firm, while its other exposures include a 9.14% stake in Adani Ports and 5.96% in Adani Total Gas

    Adani Transmission dropped lost 10%, while Adani Green, Adani Total Gas Ltd, Adani Power, and Adani Wilmar fell 5% each

    Adani Ports rose 9.3%, the only stock to buck the trend

    In the brutal fallout of Hindenburg's report, Adani group flagship company Adani Enterprises Ltd was forced to abandon a $2.5 billion share sale last week, and Adani lost his crown as Asia's richest person and slipped down the global rankings of the wealthy

  • ‘BIG SHORT’ HEDGE FUNDER SAYS HE THINKS WE’RE HEADED FOR A ‘RUN-OF-THE-MILL’ RECESSION—BUT THE BIGGER ‘PARADIGM SHIFT’ IS REALLY ON HIS MIND

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/big-short-hedge-funder-says-212252104.html

    78.57% Shortened!

    Tech and growth-focused stocks have dominated markets for over a decade, but a “paradigm shift” is coming as the Federal Reserve raises interest rates to fight inflation, according to Steve Eisman, senior portfolio manager at the Neuberger Berman Group

    I think something like that happens in markets,” he said

    He described how former stock market leaders were overtaken during past market paradigm shifts like the one happening now, noting that the financial stocks which outperformed before 2008, “literally did nothing until 2020.” “Call it a dozen years where the old leadership group evaporated,” he said

    The hedge funder went on to argue that the rise of growth and tech stocks that were market leaders to start the year is an example of how “people don’t give up paradigms easily.” The tech-heavy Nasdaq is up more than 13% year to date, and Cathie Wood’s ARK Innovation ETF—which focuses on tech and growth stocks and became a bellwether for the sector during the pandemic—is up more than 37%

    “I think 2000 and 2008 for some investors is like PTSD,” he said

    “Something bad could happen, you know, we could have a recession,” he said

    ['growth', 'stock', 'market', 'paradigm', 'eisman']

    He described how former stock market leaders were overtaken during past market paradigm shifts like the one happening now, noting that the financial stocks which outperformed before 2008, “literally did nothing until 2020.” “Call it a dozen years where the old leadership group evaporated,” he said

  • 84% OF RETIREES ARE MAKING THIS RMD MISTAKE. ARE YOU ONE OF THEM?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/84-retirees-rmd-mistake-130022029.html

    83.33% Shortened!

    A financial advisor can help you right-size your retirement income

    In fact, the RMD approach tends to generate more income later in retirement and can even leave a sizable account balance at age 100.” What Are RMDs? An RMD is the minimum amount the government requires most retirees withdraw from their tax-advantaged retirement accounts at a certain age

    In 2020, the RMD age was raised from 70.5 to 72

    If a 75-year-old retiree has $250,000 in a retirement account, he would be required to withdraw at least $10,917 from his account that year

    Declining Consumption Strategy Using an RMD approach, a retiree simply sticks to the minimum required distributions each year

    A withdrawal approach more closely aligned with a retiree’s spending needs will provide more retirement income and lessen the chances that retirement funds will outlast the retiree

    ['retiree', 'retirement', 'year', 'approach', 'rmd']

    Casemiro will miss Man United's next three matches after his red card against Crystal Palace Casemiro's influence has been compared to Manchester United's former captain Roy Keane Sheringham won three Premier League titles in the United team led by Keane, including playing a key role in their treble season in 1998-99

    'All I will say about Casemiro is I think he is like a Roy Keane that they have been missing for the last eight years,' said Sheringham, who scored 46 goals in 153 games for United

    Keane last month had described Casemiro as a 'huge player' at United, after seeing the midfield look noticeably weaker when he was serving a one-match suspension against Arsenal

    Teddy Sheringham suggested Casemiro drives standards like former United captain Keane Keane last month lauded Casemiro's impact since joining Manchester United last summer 'He's a big personality, has won the big trophies before,' Keane said

    'Sometimes you realise how good a player he is when he's not in the team

    ['position', 'add', 'successfully', 'high', 'rate']

  • MALAYSIA AMONG EARLIEST TO SEND SAR TEAM TO TURKIYE FOLLOWING EARTHQUAKE, SAYS MINISTER

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/07/malaysia-among-earliest-to-send-sar-team-to-turkiye-following-earthquake-says-minister

    02/07/2023, 20:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Minister in the Prime Minister's Department (Sabah, Sarawak Affairs and Special Duties) Datuk Armizan Mohd Ali (pic) said that the 70-member team led by Commander Mohd Khairul Jamil arrived safely in Turkiye at 5.50am local time (10.50am Malaysian time) today (Feb 7)

    "The Turkish government has so far requested help with regard to urban search and rescue, which is why we have sent the SMART team," he said in an exclusive interview on Bernama Radio

    SMART - which comprises a medical team from the Royal Health Corps (KKD) and the K9 Unit of the Malaysian Fire and Rescue Department (JBPM) and a special hazardous chemical (Hazmat) team - left for Istanbul yesterday via a Turkish Airlines flight

    Meanwhile, he said meetings would be held with the Turkish Embassy in Kuala Lumpur to determine the need for an Emergency Medical Team (EMT) to be deployed to the country, and this would be coordinated with Wisma Putra and the National Disaster Management Agency (Nadma)

    "However, any parties who wish to channel aid can contact Nadma or Wisma Putra, or get in touch directly with the Turkish Embassy in Kuala Lumpur," he added

    ['kuala', 'lumpur', 'rescue', 'team', 'smart']

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Minister in the Prime Minister's Department (Sabah, Sarawak Affairs and Special Duties) Datuk Armizan Mohd Ali (pic) said that the 70-member team led by Commander Mohd Khairul Jamil arrived safely in Turkiye at 5.50am local time (10.50am Malaysian time) today (Feb 7)

    "The Turkish government has so far requested help with regard to urban search and rescue, which is why we have sent the SMART team," he said in an exclusive interview on Bernama Radio

    SMART - which comprises a medical team from the Royal Health Corps (KKD) and the K9 Unit of the Malaysian Fire and Rescue Department (JBPM) and a special hazardous chemical (Hazmat) team - left for Istanbul yesterday via a Turkish Airlines flight

    Meanwhile, he said meetings would be held with the Turkish Embassy in Kuala Lumpur to determine the need for an Emergency Medical Team (EMT) to be deployed to the country, and this would be coordinated with Wisma Putra and the National Disaster Management Agency (Nadma)

    "However, any parties who wish to channel aid can contact Nadma or Wisma Putra, or get in touch directly with the Turkish Embassy in Kuala Lumpur," he added

    Liverpool had no leaders against Wolves, and he’s a leader and the captain, or maybe even James Milner

    What Liverpool boss Jurgen Klopp has said about Man City as Premier League charges confirmed Jurgen Klopp was always going to have plenty on his mind as he contends with the fallout of Saturday's dismal defeat to Wolverhampton Wanderers

    But the Liverpool boss will surely have noted with great intrigue the news emanating from the Premier League on Monday morning

    City have been referred to an independent commission over alleged rule breaches between 2009 and 2018, with the Premier League also accusing City of not co-operating since the investigation was launched in December 2018

    City have won six Premier League titles since the takeover in 2008 by the Abu Dhabi Group, of which three saw them narrowly beat Liverpool to the crown

  • MERCEDES-BENZ TO DISCONTINUE MOST WAGON AND COUPE MODELS IN COMING YEARS DUE TO STRATEGY REALIGNMENT - PAULTAN.ORG

    https://paultan.org/2023/02/07/mercedes-benz-to-discontinue-most-wagon-and-coupe-models-in-coming-years-due-to-strategy-realignment/

    02/07/2023, 18:06

    66.67% Shortened!

    Mercedes-Benz vehicles that are on their way out include coupe and convertible versions of the C-Class and E-Class, which are due to be dropped sometime between 2023 and 2024

    Meanwhile, coupe-like SUVs and sedans will also be removed from the line-up, with the CLS set to depart in 2024, and the GT 4-Door Coupe set to follow in 2024 or 2025

    The CLA is also available as a wagon (called the Shooting Brake), and will still be offered in said body style in its next generation due in 2025, although this will be its last

    It isn’t all doom and gloom though, as there will be a new Mercedes-AMG GT coupe that is reportedly based on the current SL roadster, which itself is said to gain a Maybach version

    In 2026, a new four-door coupe, a next-generation SL and a new AMG GT Coupe – all of which will be electric – are set to make their debut

    Research Mercedes-Benz Cars at Add a comment

    ['car', 'mercedes', 'benz', 'wagon', 'coupe']

    Mercedes-Benz vehicles that are on their way out include coupe and convertible versions of the C-Class and E-Class, which are due to be dropped sometime between 2023 and 2024

    Meanwhile, coupe-like SUVs and sedans will also be removed from the line-up, with the CLS set to depart in 2024, and the GT 4-Door Coupe set to follow in 2024 or 2025

    The CLA is also available as a wagon (called the Shooting Brake), and will still be offered in said body style in its next generation due in 2025, although this will be its last

    It isn’t all doom and gloom though, as there will be a new Mercedes-AMG GT coupe that is reportedly based on the current SL roadster, which itself is said to gain a Maybach version

    In 2026, a new four-door coupe, a next-generation SL and a new AMG GT Coupe – all of which will be electric – are set to make their debut

    02/07/2023, 18:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    The FBM KLCI closed down 14.09 points, or 0.95% to 1,476.380, with 25 of the component stocks closing in negative territory

    Among the FBM KLCI component stocks, Nestle shed 50 sen to RM135.10, PETRONAS Dagangan lost 44 sen to RM22.06, Hong Leong Bank eased 30 sen to RM20.18 and Hong Leong Financial Group declined 20 sen to RM18.30

    Maxis rose eight sen to RM4.10, Digi added four sen to RM4.22, Sime Darby Plantation gained two sen to RM4.45 and Axiata climbed two sen to RM3.03

    On the broader market, F&N jumped RM1 to RM26, Panasonic Manufacturing gained 54 sen to RM23.50 and PMB Technology rose 38 sen to RM4

    Hextar Technologies fell 80 sen to RM28.20, BAT lost 28 sen to RM12.60 and MyEG eased 25.5 sen to 70 sen

  • KAKAO BECOMES SM ENTERTAINMENT'S SECOND LARGEST SHAREHOLDER

    https://www.allkpop.com/article/2023/02/kakao-becomes-sm-entertainments-second-largest-shareholder

    02/07/2023, 16:06

    45.45% Shortened!

    1834 SM Entertainment, Kakao Corporation, and Kakao Entertainment Inc

    decided to enter into a strategic partnership in various fields on February 7. It was also announced on the same day that Kakao had secured a 9.05% stake in SM Entertainment, thus becoming the second largest shareholder of SM Entertainment. With this, the inquiry disclosure that has been going on since May 2021 between SM and Kakao will come to a close with a happy ending.  Through this investment and business cooperation, the three companies agreed to pursue mutual strategic common interests by utilizing each other's business capabilities

    It was decided to maximize synergy between each company by co-planning K-POP artists through global auditions and promoting global management business together in overseas locations

    In addition, it plans to accelerate IP monetization by converging SM's powerful IP with Kakao's various platforms and AI technologies to strengthen content competitiveness and expand its global market share.  SM plans to aggressively invest the funds raised during this time in the global music publishing business, global business expansion, and acquisition of domestic and foreign labels to promote the SM 3.0 strategy

    Co-representatives Lee Seong Soo and Tak Young Joon of SM said, "Through this strategic partnership with Kakao, SM is expected to secure a strong growth engine to develop into a leading global entertainment company." Kim Yoo Jung shares about how her first play 'Shakespeare in Love' is a 'dream come true' Lee Seung Gi to marry actress Lee Da In in April Log in to comment I think SME should be careful with Kakao… They don’t seem reliable

    Kakao own 59.73% of Starship Entertainment shares, but holds accusations of defamation through their Facebook group ‘Idol Lab’

    ['entertainment', 'kakao', 'strategic', 'business', 'company']

    1834 SM Entertainment, Kakao Corporation, and Kakao Entertainment Inc

    decided to enter into a strategic partnership in various fields on February 7. It was also announced on the same day that Kakao had secured a 9.05% stake in SM Entertainment, thus becoming the second largest shareholder of SM Entertainment. With this, the inquiry disclosure that has been going on since May 2021 between SM and Kakao will come to a close with a happy ending.  Through this investment and business cooperation, the three companies agreed to pursue mutual strategic common interests by utilizing each other's business capabilities

    It was decided to maximize synergy between each company by co-planning K-POP artists through global auditions and promoting global management business together in overseas locations

    In addition, it plans to accelerate IP monetization by converging SM's powerful IP with Kakao's various platforms and AI technologies to strengthen content competitiveness and expand its global market share.  SM plans to aggressively invest the funds raised during this time in the global music publishing business, global business expansion, and acquisition of domestic and foreign labels to promote the SM 3.0 strategy

    Co-representatives Lee Seong Soo and Tak Young Joon of SM said, "Through this strategic partnership with Kakao, SM is expected to secure a strong growth engine to develop into a leading global entertainment company."     Kakao own 59.73% of Starship Entertainment shares, but holds accusations of defamation through their Facebook group ‘Idol Lab’

    45.45% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    The Transport Minister's statement comes as ridership on mass transit systems remains low, with the MRT2 Sungai Buloh and Putrajaya line expected to be fully operational by mid-March

    "So we are looking at other approaches, which includes talking to ehailing and taxi companies to solve this problem," he told a press conference after taking a ride on the MRT2 from Putrajaya Sentral to Kwasa Damansara during a trial run on Tuesday (Feb 7)

    He noted that the goal of getting at least 40% of commuters to use public transportation had yet to be achieved as the figure was estimated to be below 20%

    Loke said the ministry was also open to other suggestions including allowing the use of electric scooters, which is currently prohibited, to and from stations

    He noted that the goal of getting at least 40% of commuters to use public transportation had yet to be achieved as the figure was estimated to be below 20%

  • IN 1MDB TRIAL, EX-BANKER TELLS HIGH COURT SHE DIDN'T THINK NAJIB'S ACCOUNT WOULD BE USED FOR MONEY-LAUNDERING

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/07/in-1mdb-trial-ex-banker-tells-high-court-she-didnt-think-najibs-account-would-be-used-for-money-laundering/53790

    02/07/2023, 15:06

    86.36% Shortened!

    Shafee put it to Yu that by suggesting another currency to prevent queries on Najib's account, she was participating in money-laundering offences

    “It was my belief that this was to protect the confidentiality of the account holder

    “No, because this account was informed to Bank Negara and people in compliance, everybody was watching this account, this account was known to the higher levels,” Yu said

    But Yu said AmBank just followed instructions to keep Najib’s account details confidential

    Shafee said the whole issue would not have risen if no one topped up cash into Najib's account, as he would have realised there was no more purported “donation money” in his account if the cheques he had issued had bounced

    Today, Yu confirmed that both Low and Najib's authorised account handler Nik Faisal Ariff Kamil have told her to ensure that Najib's cheques do not bounce

  • INDONESIA TO SUSPEND SOME PALM OIL EXPORT PERMITS - OFFICIALS

    https://www.reuters.com/markets/commodities/indonesia-suspend-some-palm-oil-export-permits-senior-official-2023-02-06/

    02/07/2023

    81.82% Shortened!

    Palm oil exporters had accumulated large shipment quotas last year and they now had little incentive to supply the domestic market, he said

    Indonesia issues export permits for palm oil companies that have already sold a proportion of their products to the domestic market, under a policy known as "Domestic Market Obligation" (DMO)

    Malaysian benchmark palm oil prices have fallen more than 40% since reaching a peak last year

    Sahat blamed distributors for the tight supply in the domestic market

    Rattling global edible oil markets, Indonesia last year banned exports of palm oil used in everything from margarine to cosmetics and fuel for three weeks due to soaring cooking oil prices

    Malaysia's palm oil futures market was closed on Monday for a public holiday

    ['palm', 'oil', 'export', 'price', 'say']

    Palm oil exporters had accumulated large shipment quotas last year and they now had little incentive to supply the domestic market, he said

  • SEAMLESS INTEGRATION TO TAKE OFF NEXT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/07/seamless-integration-to-take-off-next

    02/07/2023

    64.71% Shortened!

    Transport Minister Anthony Loke gave the assurance when he made the announcement on the future of Subang Airport, which is being served by KTM’s dedicated airport service called the Skypark Link that connects passengers from KL Sentral all the way to the airport by making only one stop along the way – at the Subang Jaya station where it is also integrated with the Kelana Jaya LRT line

    Introduced in May 2018, the Skypark Link, a limited express service, is the second rail service after the Express Rail Link that connects KL Sentral with Kuala Lumpur International Airport and KLIA2

    The distance from KL Sentral to the Skypark Terminal is 26km, though the bulk of the construction cost lies in the 9km link that consists of twin tracks that begin from Subang Jaya all the way to the airport

    In view of this, KTM will suspend this service beginning Feb 15 until things improve

    “As announced last week, the trainsets will be deployed for the KTM Komuter service in the northern sector, between Padang Besar and Butterworth,” said Loke

    In an event last month, he revealed that it costs RM15mil each year to provide the Skypark Link service

    ['ktm', 'subang', 'skypark', 'airport', 'service']

    Transport Minister Anthony Loke gave the assurance when he made the announcement on the future of Subang Airport, which is being served by KTM’s dedicated airport service called the Skypark Link that connects passengers from KL Sentral all the way to the airport by making only one stop along the way – at the Subang Jaya station where it is also integrated with the Kelana Jaya LRT line

    Introduced in May 2018, the Skypark Link, a limited express service, is the second rail service after the Express Rail Link that connects KL Sentral with Kuala Lumpur International Airport and KLIA2

    The distance from KL Sentral to the Skypark Terminal is 26km, though the bulk of the construction cost lies in the 9km link that consists of twin tracks that begin from Subang Jaya all the way to the airport

    In view of this, KTM will suspend this service beginning Feb 15 until things improve

    “As announced last week, the trainsets will be deployed for the KTM Komuter service in the northern sector, between Padang Besar and Butterworth,” said Loke

    In an event last month, he revealed that it costs RM15mil each year to provide the Skypark Link service

  • BURSA FALLS AS ECONOMIC JITTERS ESCALATE

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/02/07/bursa-falls-as-economic-jitters-escalate

    02/07/2023, 13:05

    70.0% Shortened!

    IHH Healthcare lost 13 sen to RM5.90, PETRONAS Chemicals dropped 13 sen to RM8.18 and Press Metal fell 10 sen to RM5.26

    Maybank dropped eight sen to RM8.63 while Public Bank shaved three sen to RM4.18, CIMB slid three sen to RM5.63 and Hong Leong Bank fell 16 sen to RM20.32

    Malaysian Airports skidded 15 sen to RM7.03 while British American Tobacco lost 16 sen to RM12.72

    The most active counter on the market however was MyEG, which succumbed to a sell-off on news that the Immigration Department would soon centralise all immigration-related transactions under one national system

    Shares in the e-services provider were routed in morning trade, losing 22.5 sen to 73 sen on the back of 7.74 million shares crossing hands

    Meanwhile, Iris Corp, which developed the Immigration Department's national integrated immigration system (NIISe) rose 4.5 sen to 17 sen with 2.08 million units exchanging hands

    ['sell', 'investor', 'rate', 'share', 'report']

    IHH Healthcare lost 13 sen to RM5.90, PETRONAS Chemicals dropped 13 sen to RM8.18 and Press Metal fell 10 sen to RM5.26

    Maybank dropped eight sen to RM8.63 while Public Bank shaved three sen to RM4.18, CIMB slid three sen to RM5.63 and Hong Leong Bank fell 16 sen to RM20.32

    Malaysian Airports skidded 15 sen to RM7.03 while British American Tobacco lost 16 sen to RM12.72

    The most active counter on the market however was MyEG, which succumbed to a sell-off on news that the Immigration Department would soon centralise all immigration-related transactions under one national system

    Shares in the e-services provider were routed in morning trade, losing 22.5 sen to 73 sen on the back of 7.74 million shares crossing hands

    Meanwhile, Iris Corp, which developed the Immigration Department's national integrated immigration system (NIISe) rose 4.5 sen to 17 sen with 2.08 million units exchanging hands

    ['sell', 'investor', 'rate', 'share', 'report']



  • EARTHQUAKE KILLS MORE THAN 4,300 IN TURKEY, SYRIA

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2023/02/07/earthquake-kills-more-than-4300-in-turkey-syria/53716

    02/07/2023, 12:05

    82.86% Shortened!

    The confirmed death toll across the two countries has soared above 4,300 after a swarm of strong tremors near the Turkey-Syria border ― the largest of which measured at a massive 7.8-magnitude

    In the city of Kahramanmaras in southeastern Turkey, eyewitnesses struggled to comprehend the scale of the disaster

    “We can't go home,” the 55-year-old told AFP

    More than 14,000 people have so far been reported injured in Turkey, the disaster management agency said, while Syria said at least 3,411 people were injured

    Turkey is in one of the world's most active earthquake zones

    The Turkish region of Duzce suffered a 7.4-magnitude earthquake in 1999, when more than 17,000 people died

    ['turkey', 'syria', 'earthquake', 'turkish', 'city']

    Meanwhile, the Health Ministry's GitHub data repository reported that there was one death due to Covid-19 were reported on Monday

    The total number of fatalities due to Covid-19 in Malaysia remains at 36,944 since the pandemic began.

    Former United forward Sheringham has suggested that the Brazilian is exactly what United have needed, and compared the midfielder to his ex-teammate Keane

    Keane picked up 13 red cards during his career, while Casemiro's against Palace was his first since signing for the club

    Leeds are likely to be without a permanent manager for their clash with United on Wednesday night

    02/07/2023, 11:06

    66.67% Shortened!

    The amount was 89.6% higher than in the prior week, extending net foreign outflow from Bursa Malaysia for the fourth consecutive week

    The foreign interest in Malaysian equities compared with that of other markets in the region continued to diverge as offshore funds poured into Asian equities for the fifth consecutive week last week

    Taking into account the eight Asian exchanges tracked by MIDF Research, it said there was a combined net foreign inflow of US$3.21bil over the past week

    MIDF said in its weekly fund flow report that the selling on the local bourse could be owing to new political developments on the local front

    Local institutions helped to elevate the performance of Bursa Malaysia with a fourth straight week of net purchases valued at RM130.6mil

    Local retailers turned net buyers over the week with net buying of RM49.4mil

    The Prime Minister said at the monthly Prime Minister's Department gathering here on Tuesday (Feb 7) that his "friends" in the Cabinet had given their cooperation so far, even those who had "history" with him

    "We are working well together, even though we have 'history', clashes in ideas and had major fights especially between me and the deputy prime minister on my right," he laughed, referring to Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi

  • LOOK AT ME AND ZAHID, ANWAR SAYS AS HE TELLS CIVIL SERVANTS TO AMEND RIFTS AND WORK TOGETHER FOR COUNTRY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/07/look-at-me-and-zahid-anwar-says-as-he-tells-civil-servants-to-amend-rifts-and-work-together-for-country/53752

    02/07/2023, 11:05

    45.45% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise PUTRAJAYA, Feb 7 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim today called on civil servants to set aside differences and work together for the good of the country, using his own past relationship with Deputy Prime Minister Datuk Seri Ahmad Zahid Hamidi as food for thought

    Speaking at the Prime Minister’s Department’s monthly assembly this morning, Anwar said that despite their past encounters, he and Zahid currently had a united purpose which is to save the country

    Zahid was standing next to the prime minister, wearing a faint smile during the speech

    Umno president Zahid was formerly Anwar’s political foe but banded together as Pakatan Harapan and Barisan Nasional formed the coalition government following the 15th general election

    Anwar also said that although there were “undeniable successes” by the government and its departments these past few months, there was still a need to focus on improvement

    That every sen we spend we will use responsibly

    ['prime', 'minister', 'anwar', 'country', 'zahid']

  • MYEG HITS LIMIT DOWN PRICE ON NIISE REPORT, SHORT-SELLING SUSPENDED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/business/business-news/2023/02/07/myeg-hits-limit-down-at-open-on-niise-report

    02/07/2023, 11:05

    68.42% Shortened!

    The stock gapped down 30 sen or 31.41% to the bottom limit of 65.5 sen a share at the opening bell, as investors reacted with a flurry of selling activity

    As at 10.18am, the share had pared losses to trade 18.5 sen or 19.4% lower at 77 sen a share on the back of 599.83 million units exchanging hands

    "At today’s limit down price, the company’s trading at below two standard deviations to mean valuation, at about 2023 10x price-earnings

    "We maintain our RM1.30 target price as we take the position that MYEG’s concession would not compromised in 2025," said UOB

    Meanwhile, Bursa Malaysia has suspended the short selling of MyEG shares for the rest of the day under proprietary day trading (PDT) and intraday short selling (IDSS)

    This was owing to the stock's share price dropping more than 15 sen or 15% from the reference price

    ['service', 'myeg', 'share', 'immigration', 'sen']

  • PM ANWAR WANTS CABINET, CIVIL SERVANTS TO WORK AS A TEAM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/07/pm-anwar-wants-cabinet-civil-servants-to-work-as-a-team

    02/07/2023, 11:04

    64.71% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Anwar, during his monthly meeting with the staff of the Prime Minister's Department (JPM) for February on Tuesday (Feb 7), said that the relevant elements need to be applied, in an effort to be free from all wrongdoings that have occurred and may occur

    Anwar acknowledged that there was seriousness in the teamwork shown by the Cabinet and civil servants over the past few months, such as in the management of foreign workers, as well as the floods and the immediate deployment of the Special Malaysia Disaster Assistance and Rescue Team (SMART) to Turkiye

    Also present were the two Deputy Prime Ministers, Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi and Datuk Seri Fadillah Yusof

    Anwar also expressed confidence that the Cabinet line-up under the Unity Government was capable of bringing about change and working as a team to raise the country’s dignity and Malaysia Madani

    This is the fact, that we work as a team," he said

    ['prime', 'minister', 'seri', 'anwar', 'cabinet']

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Anwar, during his monthly meeting with the staff of the Prime Minister's Department (JPM) for February on Tuesday (Feb 7), said that the relevant elements need to be applied, in an effort to be free from all wrongdoings that have occurred and may occur

    Anwar acknowledged that there was seriousness in the teamwork shown by the Cabinet and civil servants over the past few months, such as in the management of foreign workers, as well as the floods and the immediate deployment of the Special Malaysia Disaster Assistance and Rescue Team (SMART) to Turkiye

    Also present were the two Deputy Prime Ministers, Datuk Seri Dr Ahmad Zahid Hamidi and Datuk Seri Fadillah Yusof

    This is the fact, that we work as a team," he said

  • MYEG GAPS DOWN AT OPENING ON NEWS IT WON'T BE INVOLVED IN IMMIGRATION MATTERS BY 2025; IRIS SEES JUMP IN INTEREST

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/654172

    02/07/2023, 10:26

    66.67% Shortened!

    NIISe, which is currently developed by Iris Corp Bhd, will replace the current Malaysian Immigration System (myIMMS) that the department has been using for about 13 years

    At the time of writing, MyEG had pared some losses to trade at 70 sen a share

    Iris Corp, conversely, gapped up to 13.5 sen from 12.5 sen at last Friday's close, and jumped to as high as 19 sen

    It estimated that immigration-related services contribute to 40-50% of MyEG's revenue.  "These immigration-related services include the renewal of foreign workers’ work permits (10-15% of total revenue) and other ancillary and commercial services, such as renewal of foreign workers’ insurance and foreign worker job matching (30-35%)

    In May 2020, the government extended MyEG’s contract for the provision of online renewal of foreign workers’ work permits for three years to May 2023

    MyEG’s Zetrix blockchain to launch mainnet on April 15

    ['myeg', 'service', 'sen', 'immigration', 'department']

    NIISe, which is currently developed by Iris Corp Bhd, will replace the current Malaysian Immigration System (myIMMS) that the department has been using for about 13 years

    At the time of writing, MyEG had pared some losses to trade at 70 sen a share

    Iris Corp, conversely, gapped up to 13.5 sen from 12.5 sen at last Friday's close, and jumped to as high as 19 sen

    It estimated that immigration-related services contribute to 40-50% of MyEG's revenue.  "These immigration-related services include the renewal of foreign workers’ work permits (10-15% of total revenue) and other ancillary and commercial services, such as renewal of foreign workers’ insurance and foreign worker job matching (30-35%)

    In May 2020, the government extended MyEG’s contract for the provision of online renewal of foreign workers’ work permits for three years to May 2023

    MyEG’s Zetrix blockchain to launch mainnet on April 15

  • ABG JO: NEW SALARY SCHEME SHOULD ATTRACT MORE CHINESE TO JOIN CIVIL SERVICE

    https://www.theborneopost.com/2023/02/07/abg-jo-new-salary-scheme-should-attract-more-chinese-to-join-civil-service/

    02/07/2023

    66.67% Shortened!

    “They are now working on our scheme so that their salary will be quite high because right now the salary of civil servants is too low,” he said at the Federation of Chinese Associations Kuching, Samarahan and Serian Division Chinese New Year Dinner here last night

    Abang Johari is also optimistic that the salary scheme revision would encourage greater diversity in applicants for civil service positions

    “If the salary is good, the Chinese will join because they will always seek greener pastures

    On another matter, the Premier called on the Chinese community to work together with the Bumiputera community to develop Greater Kuching encompassing Kuching, Samarahan, and Serian divisions

    At the dinner, Abang Johari witnessed the presentation of the Datuk Amar Wee Hood Teck Outstanding Leadership Award to Lim Ah Ted and the Tan Sri Datuk Amar Wee Boon Ping Chinese Community Service Award to Ko Wai Neng for their contributions to the Chinese community and the field of education

    He also handed over a grant of RM200,000 to the Federation of Chinese Associations Kuching, Samarahan and Serian Division, which was received by its president Datuk Richard Wee

  • MINISTER HANNAH YEOH OPTS AGAINST PURSUING SAFE SPORT LAW, TO CODIFY INSTEAD

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/07/minister-hannah-yeoh-opts-against-pursuing-safe-sport-law-to-codify-instead/52597

    02/07/2023, 08:05

    72.73% Shortened!

    On its official website, the committee defined Safe Sport as “an environment which is respectful, equitable, and free from all forms of harassment and abuse”

    Calling it the Unified Code, the Singaporean sporting authorities call it the cornerstone of the Safe Sport Programme which sets out a unified reference for the Island republic’s sporting community “that defines, describes and explains the forms of abuse and harassment which may take place in the sporting environment.” Categories of misconduct listed under the Unified Code included not just sexual misconduct, but also physical and psychological misconduct and “other inappropriate conduct or misconduct related to process.” In Malaysia, pressure for legislation to enforce Safe Sport was embodied by Safe Sport Malaysia (SSM), the organisation instrumental in drafting the proposed Safe Sport law

    SSM is led by a former national gymnast, Sarina Sundara Rajah, who collaborated with other groups to prepare the Bill on Safe Sport

    “When they first spoke about Safe Sport Act, the Anti-Sexual Harassment Act was not yet tabled in Parliament

    “I feel that we have the Penal Code, then we have the Employment Act; so, imagine a coach that is accused of sexual harassment, we’d also have the Anti-Sexual Harassment Act so there are so many and I don’t want it to be confusing,” the minister added

    Yeoh suggested that the decision to embody Safe Sport as a Code is still being studied, which means it could still be tabled as a Bill should the Task Force overseeing the matter decide otherwise.

    ['sport', 'say', 'safe', 'code', 'athlete']

    On its official website, the committee defined Safe Sport as “an environment which is respectful, equitable, and free from all forms of harassment and abuse”

    Calling it the Unified Code, the Singaporean sporting authorities call it the cornerstone of the Safe Sport Programme which sets out a unified reference for the Island republic’s sporting community “that defines, describes and explains the forms of abuse and harassment which may take place in the sporting environment.” Categories of misconduct listed under the Unified Code included not just sexual misconduct, but also physical and psychological misconduct and “other inappropriate conduct or misconduct related to process.” In Malaysia, pressure for legislation to enforce Safe Sport was embodied by Safe Sport Malaysia (SSM), the organisation instrumental in drafting the proposed Safe Sport law

    SSM is led by a former national gymnast, Sarina Sundara Rajah, who collaborated with other groups to prepare the Bill on Safe Sport

    “When they first spoke about Safe Sport Act, the Anti-Sexual Harassment Act was not yet tabled in Parliament

    “I feel that we have the Penal Code, then we have the Employment Act; so, imagine a coach that is accused of sexual harassment, we’d also have the Anti-Sexual Harassment Act so there are so many and I don’t want it to be confusing,” the minister added

    Yeoh suggested that the decision to embody Safe Sport as a Code is still being studied, which means it could still be tabled as a Bill should the Task Force overseeing the matter decide otherwise.

    ['sport', 'say', 'safe', 'code', 'athlete']

  • EARTHQUAKE KILLS MORE THAN 3,800 IN TURKEY, SYRIA

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/world/2023/02/07/earthquake-kills-more-than-3800-in-turkey-syria/53716

    02/07/2023, 08:05

    85.0% Shortened!

    “We managed to save three people, but two were dead,” said Halis Aktemur, 35, in Turkey’s southeastern city of Diyarbakir after the quake that was felt as far away as Greenland

    “Everyone is afraid.” ‘Apocalypse’ At least 1,444 people died yesterday across Syria, the government and rescuers said

    Yesterday’s first earthquake struck at 4.17am (0117 GMT) at a depth of about 18 kilometres (11 miles) near the Turkish city of Gaziantep, which is home to around two million people, the US Geological Survey said

    More than 12,000 people are injured in Turkey, the disaster management agency said, while Syria said at least 3,411 people were injured

    Turkey is in one of the world’s most active earthquake zones

    The Turkish region of Duzce suffered a 7.4-magnitude earthquake in 1999, when more than 17,000 people died

    ['turkey', 'syria', 'people', 'quake', 'say']

    “Everyone is afraid.” ‘Apocalypse’ At least 1,444 people died yesterday across Syria, the government and rescuers said

    Yesterday’s first earthquake struck at 4.17am (0117 GMT) at a depth of about 18 kilometres (11 miles) near the Turkish city of Gaziantep, which is home to around two million people, the US Geological Survey said

    More than 12,000 people are injured in Turkey, the disaster management agency said, while Syria said at least 3,411 people were injured

    Mohd Rafee said he was keen to take part in Menu Rahmah, despite it not being a compulsory programme

    “Some patrons have started asking about the menu when they drop by my restaurant,” he said in an interview

    I do not want to come up with an affordable meal only to take it off the menu after a few months,” he added

    The programme is being run with the cooperation of the Malaysian Indian Restaurant Owners’ Association, Malaysian Muslim Restaurant Owners Association, Malaysian Tomyam Operators Association, Malaysian Singapore Coffee Shop Proprietors General Association, Bumiputera Retailers Organisation, Malaysia Retail Chain Association, and Malaysia Retailers Association

    Another restaurant owner, Tan Kim Hock, said he was considering taking part in the initiative once Menu Rahmah is opened up to non-halal food outlets

    “The cheapest meal at my restaurant for a rice with two dishes is about RM7, which is slightly higher than Menu Rahmah

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/bed-bath--beyond-announces-plan-to-raise-1-billion-stock-falls-24-212006024.html

    62.5% Shortened!

    Bed Bath & Beyond's (BBBY) stock sank 24% after the embattled retailer announced it will raise as much as $1.025 billion through an equity offering

    BBBY had gained 92% during Monday's trading session ahead of the announcement, as a recent rally in the nearly-bankrupt company continued to gain momentum

    The stock soared as much as 120% during the trading session

    On Monday, AMC was briefly halted for volatility as the stock climbed as much as 19%

    Bed Bath & Beyond stock hit a 52-week low of $1.27 on Jan

    Ines is a senior business reporter for Yahoo Finance

    ['bed', 'bath', 'beyond', 'bbby', 'stock']

    You can’t rely on one player all season

    ‘The more you make a thing of it, the more of a burden you’re putting on your team

    But you’ve got to get on with it.’

    Get us in your feed

    ['united', 'game', 'casemiro', 'get', 'team']

    https://paultan.org/2023/02/07/peugeot-208-is-the-best-selling-car-in-europe-in-2022/

    02/07/2023

    79.31% Shortened!

    The French hatchback recorded 206,816 deliveries last year, which was 5% more than in 2021 and enough to dethrone to Volkswagen Golf that has been the most popular car in Europe since 2007

    Across car brands in Europe, Volkswagen continued to be the king of the region with 1,198,926 units delivered (-6%), with Toyota (766,227 units; +8%) in second and Mercedes-Benz in third (647,880 units; +1%)

    The podium finishers are followed by BMW in fourth (646,526 units; -5%), Peugeot in fifth (623,825 units; -15%), Audi in sixth (614,276 units; +3%), Renault in seventh (584,804 units; -14%), Ford in eighth (548,045 units; -1%), Skoda in ninth (538,008 units; -9%) and Kia in tenth (537,508 units; +7%)

    Europeans many buy small car like the Japanese.

    Definitely they won’t, because 208 is made by Peugeot, not VW

    Bangang What does vw got to do with the 208? Peugeot Anne

    The French hatchback recorded 206,816 deliveries last year, which was 5% more than in 2021 and enough to dethrone to Volkswagen Golf that has been the most popular car in Europe since 2007

    Across car brands in Europe, Volkswagen continued to be the king of the region with 1,198,926 units delivered (-6%), with Toyota (766,227 units; +8%) in second and Mercedes-Benz in third (647,880 units; +1%)

    The podium finishers are followed by BMW in fourth (646,526 units; -5%), Peugeot in fifth (623,825 units; -15%), Audi in sixth (614,276 units; +3%), Renault in seventh (584,804 units; -14%), Ford in eighth (548,045 units; -1%), Skoda in ninth (538,008 units; -9%) and Kia in tenth (537,508 units; +7%)

  • HARTALEGA BOOKS 3Q NET LOSS OF RM32M, HIT BY GLOVE OVERSUPPLY

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/654232

    02/07/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    It also represented the second loss-making quarter for the group in 12 months, having recorded a net loss of RM197.9 million on a revenue of RM968.69 million for 4QFY2022

    As a result, Hartalega recorded a loss per share of 0.93 sen for 3QFY2023, compared to earnings per share (EPS) of 7.58 sen for 3QFY2022

    Revenue for 3QFY2023 fell 54% year-on-year (y-o-y) to RM461.84 million from RM1.01 billion

    It was the group’s weakest quarterly revenue since 3QFY2017, when Hartalega recorded a revenue of RM456.29 million

    The weak quarterly performance also dragged Hartalega’s net profit down by 97.5% y-o-y to RM84.71 million for the nine-month period ended Dec 31, 2022 (9MFY2023)

    Revenue for the period fell 72.7% to RM1.89 billion, from RM6.92 billion for 9MFY2022

    ['search', 'hartalega', 'glove', 'net', 'loss']

    It also represented the second loss-making quarter for the group in 12 months, having recorded a net loss of RM197.9 million on a revenue of RM968.69 million for 4QFY2022

    As a result, Hartalega recorded a loss per share of 0.93 sen for 3QFY2023, compared to earnings per share (EPS) of 7.58 sen for 3QFY2022

    Revenue for 3QFY2023 fell 54% year-on-year (y-o-y) to RM461.84 million from RM1.01 billion

    It was the group’s weakest quarterly revenue since 3QFY2017, when Hartalega recorded a revenue of RM456.29 million

    The weak quarterly performance also dragged Hartalega’s net profit down by 97.5% y-o-y to RM84.71 million for the nine-month period ended Dec 31, 2022 (9MFY2023)

  • ATA IMS RALLY MAY BE DUE TO OPTIMISM ABOUT SECURING NEW MAJOR CUSTOMER, SAYS CGS-CIMB

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/654208

    02/07/2023

    57.14% Shortened!

    The research house said this in a note on Monday (Feb 6) that analysed the potential reason for the 127% jump in ATA IMS' share price to close at 46.5 sen last Friday, from 20.5 sen on Jan 20

    The potential new customer could boost ATA IMS’s future earnings prospects, after the company reported a core net loss of RM23 million for the first six months ended Sept 30, 2022 (6MFY2023), he said

    Assuming that ATA IMS has secured a new multinational corporation customer for box-built assembly products, the company could post FY2024 core net profit accretion of RM31.5 million, and FY2025 core net profit accretion of RM105 million, under a blue-sky scenario that the roll-out of the first product model to the customer is in June 2023, with four new product models in February 2024, he said

    He said the target price for ATA IMS would have a 79% upside to 83 sen per share in the blue-sky scenario, but a 54% downside in the bear-case scenario to 21 sen on the assumption of no new customer wins for FY2024 to FY2025

    Nagulan observed that ATA IMS sat on net cash of RM18.3 million as at end-September 2022, which represented net cash per share of two sen

    “We will only turn more bullish once and if ATA IMS secures a major new customer, which should serve as a strong rerating catalyst,” he said

    ['ata', 'ims', 'new', 'say', 'sen']

    The research house said this in a note on Monday (Feb 6) that analysed the potential reason for the 127% jump in ATA IMS' share price to close at 46.5 sen last Friday, from 20.5 sen on Jan 20

    The potential new customer could boost ATA IMS’s future earnings prospects, after the company reported a core net loss of RM23 million for the first six months ended Sept 30, 2022 (6MFY2023), he said

    Assuming that ATA IMS has secured a new multinational corporation customer for box-built assembly products, the company could post FY2024 core net profit accretion of RM31.5 million, and FY2025 core net profit accretion of RM105 million, under a blue-sky scenario that the roll-out of the first product model to the customer is in June 2023, with four new product models in February 2024, he said

    He said the target price for ATA IMS would have a 79% upside to 83 sen per share in the blue-sky scenario, but a 54% downside in the bear-case scenario to 21 sen on the assumption of no new customer wins for FY2024 to FY2025

    Nagulan observed that ATA IMS sat on net cash of RM18.3 million as at end-September 2022, which represented net cash per share of two sen

    “We will only turn more bullish once and if ATA IMS secures a major new customer, which should serve as a strong rerating catalyst,” he said

    ['ata', 'ims', 'new', 'say', 'sen']



  • SPEED UP OPENING OF SHELTER FOR STREET KIDS IN KOTA KINABALU, SAYS MP

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/07/speed-up-opening-of-shelter-for-street-kids-in-kota-kinabalu-says-mp

    02/07/2023

    73.91% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Street children at a traffic intersection in Kota Kinabalu town poses a danger to themselves and also motorsist

    Kota Kinabalu MP Chan Fong Hin said though the state government had announced the Kota Kinabalu Special Shelter for street children on Jan 31, these children were still posing danger not only to themselves but also to motorists

    He urged the state Community Development and People's Well-being Ministry to immediately make the Kota Kinabalu shelter operational as there should not be any further delay by the state government in finding solutions for the perennial problem

    Ratib informed him that they were in the final stages to open the shelter

    The street kids shelter in Kota Kinabalu will be the first and depending on its success in resolving the problem, it would be extended to other major towns in the state where similar problems exist

    ['street', 'child', 'kota', 'kinabalu', 'shelter']

  • HEALTH MINISTRY TO HOLD REGULAR MEETINGS WITH HOSPITAL DIRECTORS TO ADDRESS ISSUES AT HEALTH FACILITIES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/07/health-ministry-to-hold-regular-meetings-with-hospital-directors-to-address-issues-at-health-facilities

    02/07/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Minister Dr Zaliha Mustafa (pic) said, at the moment, the Health Ministry is also awaiting feedback on the effectiveness of the implementation of several measures taken to overcome the problems at the facilities, such as the congestion issues at the emergency department in hospitals

    "The latest, for example, is at the Klang Hospital (Tengku Ampuan Rahimah Hospital) where they make sure only patients with emergency cases are treated at the Emergency Department, while cold cases are channelled to the clinics

    "That’s a move they felt is the best for their facility and this has to be discussed in regular meetings, as well as through monitoring, to see the results,” she told reporters here Tuesday (Feb 7)

    Dr Zaliha said the ministry had also deployed several officers to the ground to gather feedback and information on the real situation at public hospitals and health clinics

    Dr Zaliha in a tweet yesterday said the the ministry will continue to listen and work on identifying solutions pertaining to issues in the emergency department in hospitals

    ['health', 'ministry', 'hospital', 'issue', 'facility']

  • EBIT LEW CASE: COPS SEIZED FIRDAUS WONG'S PHONE, COURT TOLD

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/07/ebit-lew-case-cops-seized-firdaus-wongs-phone-court-told

    02/07/2023

    66.67% Shortened!

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Police officer Supt Hirdawati Isa, 42, said the phone was seized at 7.05pm on Sept 28, 2021

    The sixth prosecution witness said she was instructed by investigating officer Supt Noor Asyikin Shamsuri to seize the phone when Wong came to Bukit Aman that day

    "On that day (Sept 28, 2021), Wong came to the D11 office at Bukit Aman, I introduced myself as a policewoman and asked Wong to hand over his identity card

    "I (then) ordered Wong to hand over his mobile phone to me," she said during the examination-in-chief by Deputy Public Prosecutor Zahida Zakaria today (Feb 7)

    Supt Hirdawati, however, said she did not check the contents of the mobile phone and had handed it over to Supt Noor Asyikin the same day

    ['lew', 'phone', 'prosecution', 'witness', 'wong']

    The sixth prosecution witness said she was instructed by investigating officer Supt Noor Asyikin Shamsuri to seize the phone when Wong came to Bukit Aman that day

    "On that day (Sept 28, 2021), Wong came to the D11 office at Bukit Aman, I introduced myself as a policewoman and asked Wong to hand over his identity card

    "I (then) ordered Wong to hand over his mobile phone to me," she said during the examination-in-chief by Deputy Public Prosecutor Zahida Zakaria today (Feb 7)

  • MYEG BUYS BACK TWO MILLION SHARES AS PRICES FALL TO OVER TWO-YEAR LOW

    https://www.theedgemarkets.com/node/654299

    02/07/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    Subsequent to the latest acquisition, Wong has a 12.4% direct interest and a 17.27% indirect interest in MyEG

    The company’s share price fell as much as 30 sen or 31.5% to an intraday low of 65.5 sen on Tuesday, after news reports that immigration services provided by MyEG will be reverted back to the government by 2025

    In response, MyEG told Bursa Malaysia that it has not held any meeting with the Ministry of Home Affairs or the Immigration Department of Malaysia on converging all immigration transactions under the government’s NIISe

    At market close, MyEG pared some losses to settle 25.5 sen or 26.7% lower at 70 sen, lowest since November 2020

    “If the immigration services are transferred back to the immigration department as planned, it could potentially leave a negative impact on MyEG’s revenue in the long term, (and) as such, (would) lower potential net income by almost 20% after 2025.  “In contrast, if the immigration [is] unable to deploy the NIISe by 2025, this will provide a better outlook for MyEG, as it will prolong the schedule for foreign workers’ work permit renewal services to return to the immigration department,” said MIDF

    MyEG closes at 26-month low on news all immigration services to revert to govt by 2025

    ['search', 'myeg', 'service', 'share', 'low']

    Tuesday, 07 Feb 2023

    Authorities also seized spears and machetes in the raid, Khairul Dzaimee said, in response to a statement by Indonesia’s National Commission on Human Rights condemning the 1.30am Feb 1 raid

    Khairul Dzaimee gave his assurance that all the detainees sent to the Immigration depot in Lenggeng would be well looked after

    Khairul Dzaimee said the authorities conducted the raid following complaints from locals concerned about their safety

    The department also conducted a month-long surveillance before the raid, he added

    Khairul Dzaimee added that the detainees would be repatriated as soon as possible, and stressed that the raid had nothing to do with the department's Labour Recalibration Programme 2.0 (RTK 2.0) which allows employers to register illegal foreign workers

  • SHOULD I SWITCH MY SOCIAL SECURITY BENEFIT TO A SPOUSAL BENEFIT?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/switch-social-security-benefit-spousal-130049081.html

    86.67% Shortened!

    When someone files for Social Security benefits, their spouse may be able to claim a spousal benefit

    The benefit is based on their spouse’s contributions to Social Security and is capped at 50% of their benefit amount at full retirement age

    Can I Switch My Social Security Benefit to a Spousal Benefit? Switching from your regular retirement benefit to a spousal benefit is something you might be interested in if you’re hoping to maximize Social Security benefits

    When your spouse files for their benefit later you could switch to spousal benefits

    In that situation, you could then apply for an additional spousal benefit on top of your regular benefit once their benefits kick in

    The Bottom Line It’s possible to switch your Social Security retirement benefit to spousal benefits if your spouse hasn’t filed yet

    ['social', 'security', 'benefit', 'retirement', 'spousal']

    When someone files for Social Security benefits, their spouse may be able to claim a spousal benefit

    The benefit is based on their spouse’s contributions to Social Security and is capped at 50% of their benefit amount at full retirement age

    Can I Switch My Social Security Benefit to a Spousal Benefit? Switching from your regular retirement benefit to a spousal benefit is something you might be interested in if you’re hoping to maximize Social Security benefits

    When your spouse files for their benefit later you could switch to spousal benefits

    In that situation, you could then apply for an additional spousal benefit on top of your regular benefit once their benefits kick in

    The Bottom Line It’s possible to switch your Social Security retirement benefit to spousal benefits if your spouse hasn’t filed yet

    ['social', 'security', 'benefit', 'retirement', 'spousal']

  • EXPLAINER - WHY WAS THE TURKEY-SYRIA EARTHQUAKE SO BAD?

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/world/2023/02/06/explainer---why-was-the-turkey-syria-earthquake-so-bad

    02/07/2023, 00:05

    79.31% Shortened!

    But in 1822, a 7.0 quake hit the region, killing an estimated 20,000 people

    HOW BAD WAS THIS EARTHQUAKE? On average, there are fewer than 20 quakes over 7.0 magnitude in any year, making Monday's event severe

    Only two of the deadliest earthquakes from 2013 to 2022 were of the same magnitude as Monday's quake

    WHY WAS IT SO SEVERE? The East Anatolian Fault is a strike-slip fault

    The initial rupture for the Turkey-Syria earthquake kicked off at a relatively shallow depth

    Nepal's 7.8-magnitude earthquake in 2015 claimed nearly 9,000 lives

    ['earthquake', 'turkey', 'magnitude', 'say', 'fault']

  • NEST EGGS SHRANK IN 2022. BUT DOES 1 MORE YEAR OF WORK REALLY MATTER FOR RETIREMENT SAFETY? HERE ARE THE 3 BIG WAYS WORKING LONGER CAN BENEFIT YOU

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/nest-eggs-shrank-2022-does-110000148.html

    72.73% Shortened!

    The post-pandemic market downturn has taken its toll on retirement nest eggs

    Those losses likely led many older Americans who’d been otherwise eyeing retirement to stay in the workforce instead

    Suppose you wait to apply for Social Security until the full retirement age

    (It is worth noting that for anyone born in 1960 or later, the full retirement age is 67.) If you wait until then, you can get a delayed retirement credit of up to 8% of your yearly benefits on top of the maximum benefit amount

    Delaying retirement will likely keep you enrolled in your employer’s health insurance plan

    To help offset this high cost, you could stay active by staying in the workforce

    ['retirement', 'year', 'old', 'benefit', 'work']

    The post-pandemic market downturn has taken its toll on retirement nest eggs

    Those losses likely led many older Americans who’d been otherwise eyeing retirement to stay in the workforce instead

    Suppose you wait to apply for Social Security until the full retirement age

    (It is worth noting that for anyone born in 1960 or later, the full retirement age is 67.) If you wait until then, you can get a delayed retirement credit of up to 8% of your yearly benefits on top of the maximum benefit amount

    Delaying retirement will likely keep you enrolled in your employer’s health insurance plan

    To help offset this high cost, you could stay active by staying in the workforce

    ['retirement', 'year', 'old', 'benefit', 'work']

    “When the party Umno’s accounts were frozen, Tan Sri Muhyiddin gave strong support towards the duties, the professionalism of the MACC (Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission)

    How is it possible for any religion to be used to defend corruption and abuses of power, what more Islam which firmly rejects abuses of power and corruption in systems that originate from corruption that is widespread in our country? “That is what I urge for, so that we don’t have to repeatedly stress this, but this needs the cooperation from all, give space to these enforcement bodies to act firmly

    If clean, won’t be afraid

    All say that we are a clean party and form a clean party, we should support all,” he said, questioning rhetorically how corruption could be cleaned up if powers are not given to enforcement agencies to carry out and fulfil their duties

    “We believe it is now time to end the political polemic and instability that has been going on because it affects the development of the state and the people

    She also apologised to the party president, colleagues and supporters of Warisan

  • STEVE EISMAN OF ‘BIG SHORT’ FAME SEES A NEW PARADIGM UNFOLDING IN MARKETS

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/steve-eisman-big-short-fame-090001126.html

    81.25% Shortened!

    “Some of those stocks are up 50 to 60%,” Eisman says

    I think something like that happens in markets.” Eisman describes previous paradigm shifts, including the transition from big conglomerates like General Electric Co

    “If he leaves them there, I think we'll have a paradigm shift

    If he cuts it again, we'll go back to what we were, which is growth stocks… I think he's gonna leave them there and then we'll have a paradigm shift," says Eisman

    “I think 2000 and 2008 for some investors is like PTSD,” Eisman says

    “As long as people are employed, they’re not going to sell their home down 40%.” In this scenario, that means the housing market is frozen for now, rather than poised for another big crash

    Members of opposition Congress party demanding an investigation into allegations of fraud and stock manipulation by India's Adani Group on Feb 6, 2023

    In the brutal fallout of Hindenburg's report, Adani Group flagship company Adani Enterprises was forced to abandon a US$2.5 billion share sale last week

    SBI said last Friday it was not concerned about the exposure to the Adani group, but further financing to its projects would be "evaluated on its own merit"

    India's divestment secretary Tuhin Kanta Pandey told Reuters last Friday that LIC shareholders and customers should not be concerned about its exposure to the Adani Group

    Adani Transmission Ltd dropped 10 per cent, while Adani Green Energy, Adani Total Gas, Adani Power, and Adani Wilmar fell roughly 5 per cent

    Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone was the only stock to buck the trend, rising 1.2 per cent.

  • FINANCE MINISTRY TO MEET PLUS OVER JOHOR'S REQUEST FOR NSE LANE EXPANSION

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/finance-ministry-to-meet-plus-over-johor039s-request-for-nse-lane-expansion

    02/06/2023, 16:07

    53.85% Shortened!

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    Deputy Finance Minister Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan (pic) said the request by the Johor government for the increase, from four to six lanes, was to reduce traffic congestion along the stretch

    "(But) when you go to Johor, there are only four lanes, whereas Johor makes such a large contribution to the nation's wealth and income," he told reporters after the state-level 2023 Budget dialogue in Kota Iskandar here on Monday (Feb 6)

    Ahmad, who is Pontian MP, said the next budget dialogue session will be in Perak and Friday (Feb 10) has been set as the deadline for the ministry to receive proposals for the Budget 2023

    Also present at the dialogue were Johor Mentri Besar Datuk Onn Hafiz Ghazi and state secretary Tan Sri Dr Azmi Rohani

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['feb', 'finance', 'johor', 'lane', 'ahmad']

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    Deputy Finance Minister Datuk Seri Ahmad Maslan (pic) said the request by the Johor government for the increase, from four to six lanes, was to reduce traffic congestion along the stretch

    "(But) when you go to Johor, there are only four lanes, whereas Johor makes such a large contribution to the nation's wealth and income," he told reporters after the state-level 2023 Budget dialogue in Kota Iskandar here on Monday (Feb 6)

    Ahmad, who is Pontian MP, said the next budget dialogue session will be in Perak and Friday (Feb 10) has been set as the deadline for the ministry to receive proposals for the Budget 2023

    Also present at the dialogue were Johor Mentri Besar Datuk Onn Hafiz Ghazi and state secretary Tan Sri Dr Azmi Rohani

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • HONG KONG SEES INFLUX OF CHINESE VISITORS AS BORDERS REOPEN FULLY

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/hong-kong-influx-china-chinese-visitors-borders-reopen-fully-covid-19-3256901

    02/06/2023, 16:05

    70.0% Shortened!

    Travellers cross at Lo Wu Control Point on the first day China fully resumed cross border travel to Hong Kong and Macao, in Hong Kong, China on Feb 6, 2023

    China announced last week that cross border travel between the mainland, Hong Kong and Macao would fully resume from Feb 6, dropping existing quotas and scrapping a mandatory COVID-19 test that was required before travelling

    Around 22,000 passengers used the Lo Wu station checkpoint by midday on Monday, Hong Kong's MTR Corp said in a statement

    Lo Wu was one of three of Hong Kong's border checkpoints that had not yet reopened

    It was like going back to the old days," said Christine Li, 35, who was travelling from Hong Kong to Shenzhen to see her family

    The reopening came after Hong Kong announced a promotion campaign dubbed "Hello Hong Kong" to lure back visitors, businesses and investors to the financial hub after more than three years of tough COVID-19 curbs

    ['china', 'border', 'travel', 'hong', 'kong']

  • HEALTH MINISTER ADMITS SCALE OF PROBLEM FACING EMERGENCY DEPARTMENTS AT PUBLIC HOSPITALS

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/06/health-minister-admits-scale-of-problem-facing-emergency-departments-at-public-hospitals/53624

    02/06/2023, 15:06

    66.67% Shortened!

    The admission came amid growing warnings about the mental and physical fatigue suffered by both staff and patients, which healthcare activists have warned could cause the public healthcare system to collapse if it remained unaddressed

    CodeBlue, an online health news site, recently published its survey findings that exposed deep fault lines within the public healthcare system, with 95 per cent of respondents, mostly healthcare workers, saying they believe public hospitals are in a “crisis”

    The survey was titled “Dissatisfaction Among Health Care Professionals and Workers in Malaysia’s Health Service”

    Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim is expected to retain the proposed increase in allocation of RM36.14 billion for the Ministry of Health (MoH) under Budget 2023, an increase of about 11.5 per cent from RM32.41 billion allocated in Budget 2022

    Dr Zaliha has pledged to table a Health White Paper in a bid to resolve the entrenched issues facing public healthcare

    Many frontliners have worked beyond the call of duty during the pandemic, and continue to do so as we face a tsunami of NCDs (non-communicative diseases) post-pandemic,” the minister wrote

    ['health', 'minister', 'public', 'hospital', 'staff']

    62.5% Shortened!

    On Sunday, Mentri Besar Datuk Onn Hafiz Ghazi said anyone found littering in public places would face a RM500 fine, part of the state government's initiative to beef up enforcement of environmental cleanliness under the Johor Bersih initiative

    He said the state government and all 16 local councils in Johor had discussed this matter, and it was time for serious action against those who disregard the rules

    "We can issue a maximum fine of RM500 to those caught littering, under the Street, Drainage and Building Act 1974

    “Although the state government introduced the Johor Bersih initiative last year, the level of awareness among the public is still low,” he added.

  • AT LEAST 245 DEAD IN SYRIA AFTER TURKEY EARTHQUAKE

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/world/turkey-syria-earthquake-more-100-dead-damage-3256346

    02/06/2023, 12:05

    73.91% Shortened!

    In this handout photo taken by Sana news agency in Hama, Syria on Feb 6, 2023, rescuers search for victims from an eight-storey building that collapsed after an 7.9-magnitude earthquake in southern Turkey

    AFP correspondents in northern Syria said terrified residents ran out of their homes after the earthquake struck before dawn near the Turkish city of Gaziantep, about 40km from the Syrian border

    SANA said the earthquake was felt from the western coast of Latakia to Damascus

    "This earthquake is the strongest since the National Earthquake Centre was founded in 1995," Raed Ahmed, who heads the centre, told SANA

    Near the border town of Azaz, an AFP correspondent saw rescuers pull out survivors as well as five bodies out of the rubble of a three-storey building that crumbled

    In Azmarin on the Turkish border, at least 10 buildings had collapsed, an AFP correspondent in the town reported

    ['syria', 'building', 'collapse', 'earthquake', 'afp']

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/man-arrested-over-provocative-tiktok-vidoe-of-traffic-cops

    02/06/2023, 12:05

    53.85% Shortened!

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    Kangar OCPD Asst Comm Yusharifuddin Mohd Yusop said the 39-year-old man, who works as a lorry driver transporting fertiliser, was remanded for three days, starting from the date of his arrest on Feb 4, until Tuesday (Feb 7) to assist in the investigation

    On Feb 4, the suspect uploaded a 35-second long video, through his TikTok account, showing three traffic police officers conducting a routine inspection on Jalan Kangar-Alor Setar near the Simpang Ampat traffic lights in Perlis

    "The traffic officers inspected the suspect’s lorry and subsequently issued four summonses, which the suspect was unhappy about," he said

    "The video uploaded by the suspect is provocative and slanderous, which can create a bad impression for the public towards the police, as well as negative comments from the public about the clip, which can tarnish the image of the traffic police officers in the video,” he said

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

  • HERE'S HOW TO DELAY TAKING REQUIRED WITHDRAWALS FROM RETIREMENT ACCOUNTS

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/heres-how-to-delay-taking-required-withdrawals-from-retirement-accounts-131552981.html

    80.65% Shortened!

    That will extend even further to age 75 in 2033

    One exception that may let you push your RMD from an employer-sponsored 401(k) or (403(b) plan even further down the line is simply not retiring

    If you continue to work past age 73 and do not own more than 5% of the business you work for, most employer plans allow you to defer your RMD until April 1 of the year after you retire from that employer’s plan, according to IRS Publication 575

    And when you decide to retire officially will make a difference in when your RMD must start

    So you’re still on the hook to take an RMD from any IRAs (including SEP and SIMPLE IRAs) or any tax-deferred retirement accounts you own in a former employer’s plan

    Another strategy to steer clear of the RMD rule is to convert a traditional IRA, or part of it, into a Roth IRA

    ['retirement', 'year', 'rmd', 'ira', 'plan']

    That will extend even further to age 75 in 2033

    One exception that may let you push your RMD from an employer-sponsored 401(k) or (403(b) plan even further down the line is simply not retiring

    If you continue to work past age 73 and do not own more than 5% of the business you work for, most employer plans allow you to defer your RMD until April 1 of the year after you retire from that employer’s plan, according to IRS Publication 575

    And when you decide to retire officially will make a difference in when your RMD must start

    So you’re still on the hook to take an RMD from any IRAs (including SEP and SIMPLE IRAs) or any tax-deferred retirement accounts you own in a former employer’s plan

    Another strategy to steer clear of the RMD rule is to convert a traditional IRA, or part of it, into a Roth IRA

    ['retirement', 'year', 'rmd', 'ira', 'plan']



  • CABINET HAS GIVEN NOD FOR SUBANG AIRPORT REVAMP, SAYS TRANSPORT MINISTER

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/cabinet-has-given-nod-for-subang-airport-revamp-says-transport-minister

    02/06/2023, 12:04

    57.14% Shortened!

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    "The SARP will focus on seven major components which includes the introduction of commercial jet passenger flights for general aviation, business aviation, urban air mobility and regional commercial flight operations

    "The airport will also be developed into a hub for the aerospace industry; maintenance, repair and overhaul operations; and research and development," the Transport Minister said in a a press conference at Subang Skypark terminal on Monday (Feb 6)

    "The end goal would be to turn Subang airport into a regional aviation hub with a maximum capacity of 8mil annual passengers, which will create thousands of high-value jobs in Malaysia," he said

    Subang airport, also known as the Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport, currently serves as the base for SKS Airways, Firefly and Batik Air Malaysia commercial turboprop services

    Cargo airline Raya Airways is the only other airline operating non-passenger, non-turboprop aircraft at Subang Airport's Terminal 2.

    ['subang', 'airport', 'aviation', 'plan', 'sarp']

    60.0% Shortened!

    In a Facebook post, Pasir Gudang MP Hassan Abdul Karim said this was an old photo taken in 2019 before the fall of the previous Pakatan Harapan administration

    Communications and Digital Minister Fahmi Fadzil said the owner of the Facebook account was found to have malicious intent and deliberately created a negative perception of the Prime Minister by sharing an old photo

    “This Facebook owner had used an old photo (which also features my friend Abd Rahman Yusof, who died on June 8, 2021)

    “I have requested MCMC and the police to immediately investigate the matter,” he said in a Facebook post yesterday

    defame Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim

  • MINISTER VOICES SHOCK AT CUT IN ALLOCATION FOR MPS BUT UNDERSTANDS NEED FOR IT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/minister-voices-shock-at-cut-in-allocation-for-mps-but-understands-need-for-it

    02/06/2023, 10:04

    70.0% Shortened!

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    Works Minister Datuk Seri Alexander Nanta Linggi took to Facebook to express his dismay at the cuts as it will affect MPs serving constituencies in the interior, particularly in Sarawak

    The allocation cut saw several backbenchers from both sides of the political divide voicing their dismay, saying that it would affect their service to the people

    Meanwhile, Nanta, who is Kapit MP, noted that the decrease in allocation would make it difficult for him and other MPs to address the needs of constituents in the rural and interior areas

    Although upset at the allocation cut, Nanta said he has to accept the decision with the hope that it would be increased again from time to time.

    Thank you for your report! Copyright © 1995-

    ['minister', 'cut', 'allocation', 'nanta', 'mp']

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    Works Minister Datuk Seri Alexander Nanta Linggi took to Facebook to express his dismay at the cuts as it will affect MPs serving constituencies in the interior, particularly in Sarawak

    The allocation cut saw several backbenchers from both sides of the political divide voicing their dismay, saying that it would affect their service to the people

    Meanwhile, Nanta, who is Kapit MP, noted that the decrease in allocation would make it difficult for him and other MPs to address the needs of constituents in the rural and interior areas

    Although upset at the allocation cut, Nanta said he has to accept the decision with the hope that it would be increased again from time to time.

  • MANCHESTER UNITED ARE ABOUT SHOW IF THEY HAVE LEARNED VALUABLE CASEMIRO LESSON

    https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/man-united-casemiro-team-news-26162185

    02/06/2023

    60.0% Shortened!

    Man Utd are set to be without midfielder Casemiro for three matches following his red card against Crystal Palace

    United continued their rejuvenation under Erik ten Hag with another home win at the weekend, the type of straightforward victory that they have become accustomed to recording in recent months

    That could become even clearer in the coming weeks, with the Brazilian set to miss the next three Premier League matches through suspension after his red card at the weekend

    In order to do so, Ten Hag will be hoping his side can dominate possession and minimise the need for a defensive specialist, though that will be particularly tricky with Eriksen also out injured

    What was clear from the Arsenal defeat is that United paid the price for not adapting the set-up to cater for the loss of Casemiro, and across the next three matches solving that must be a priority

    They might not be able to find anyone who can do what Casemiro does, but they might not need to

    ['casemiro', 'match', 'united', 'win', 'ten']
