  • JAMIE CARRAGHER PROVIDES HONEST OPINION ON JURGEN KLOPP EXIT FEARS AT LIVERPOOL

    https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/jurgen-klopp-liverpool-future-carragher-29141370

    02/06/2023, 09:05

    70.0% Shortened!

    Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp has come under increased pressure, with last season's Premier League runners-up losing a third straight away league game on Saturday Former Liverpool star Jamie Carragher claimed Reds fans will still want Jurgen Klopp in the dugout at the start of next season despite the Reds' recent struggles

    It was the third time in a row that Liverpool have lost away from home in the league, while they have still yet to win a game in the competition in 2023

    “There's a lot of questions that need to be asked and a lot of answers to be found, but at the start of next season I don't think there's anyone Liverpool supporters would want in that dugout other than Jurgen Klopp," Sky Sports pundit Carragher said

    Liverpool's only victory in 2023 came in a previous game against Wolves in their FA Cup third round replay, but Brighton eliminated Klopp's team in the very next round of the competition

    Carragher also hit out at Liverpool's transfer policy

    They've got to the start of this season, and from day one at Fulham, they haven't been able to cope with the intensity of a Premier League game of football and they've been ran over in every game that they've played." Does Jurgen Klopp deserve more time? Have your say in the comments section Klopp himself accepted there were no excuses after his team's slow start at Molineux

    ['liverpool', 'klopp', 'season', 'league', 'game']

  • CAN I BUY A HOME WITH AN LLC?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/buy-home-llc-140026312.html

    88.24% Shortened!

    Here's how to buy a house with an LLC, as well as what to know before doing it

    They'll be suing the LLC, leaving your name out of it. There are also some tax benefits to owning a property with an LLC, depending on the type of LLC

    To start buying a house with an LLC, you need an LLC

    Once you have an LLC set up, you will need to finance the purchase

    As the owner of the LLC, you're not personally liable

    First, you can't live in the house that you've bought with the LLC

    ['llc', 'house', 'benefit', 'tax', 'llcs']

    As the owner of the LLC, you're not personally liable

  • WHEN IN ROME: MILLENNIALS ARE CHOOSING TO ‘MAXIMIZE THEIR 20S’ WHILE MINIMIZING THEIR SAVINGS — BUT COULD IT LEAVE THEM LIVING A SPARTAN LIFE IN THEIR LATER YEARS?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/ill-money-back-twenty-something-230000472.html

    83.78% Shortened!

    One particular trend has them motivating other young people to spend big on travel while they’re still young — at the expense of their older selves’ financial security

    While it may seem irresponsible, experts say travel and financial stability don’t have to be mutually exclusive

    But while travel is a priority for Tsoi, she wouldn’t recommend going into debt for it

    If your credit card balance is going to last longer than your memories of the trip, Tsoi says it might not be the right time to jet off

    Tsoi finds the right balance by setting money aside for her retirement and emergencies first — whatever’s left over goes into travel or other fun activities

    For her right now, that’s travel

    ['tsoi', 'travel', 'go', 'make', 'say']

  • MAN UTD AND CHELSEA READY TO BREAK TRANSFER RECORD FOR VICTOR OSIMHEN

    https://metro.co.uk/2023/02/05/man-utd-and-chelsea-ready-to-break-transfer-record-for-victor-osimhen-18227636/

    02/06/2023, 08:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    BUT NOT AS YOU KNOW IT Manchester United and Chelsea are both planning to move for Napoli striker Victor Osimhen in the summer, with bids of around £107m likely, according to reports in Italy

    Italian publication Gazzetta dello Sport report that Napoli are expecting bids of €120m (£107m) from Manchester United and Chelsea in the summer transfer window

    There may well be interest in Osimhen from elsewhere as well, with Bayern Munich and Real Madrid also touted in the report as potential suitors

    If any Premier League clubs do fork out £107m for the striker then it would break the British transfer record which Chelsea just set by spending £105m on midfielder Enzo Fernandez from Benfica

    For more stories like this, check our sport page

    Follow Metro Sport for the latest news on

    ['news', 'manchester', 'chelsea', 'napoli', 'striker']

  • MANCHESTER UNITED AND CHELSEA READY TO BREAK TRANSFER RECORD FOR SERIE A STRIKER

    https://metro.co.uk/2023/02/05/man-utd-and-chelsea-ready-to-break-transfer-record-for-victor-osimhen-18227636/

    02/06/2023, 08:06

    57.14% Shortened!

    BUT NOT AS YOU KNOW IT Manchester United and Chelsea are both planning to move for Napoli striker Victor Osimhen in the summer, with bids of around £107m likely, according to reports in Italy

    Napoli are enjoying a stunning season, currently 13 points clear of Inter Milan at the top of the Serie A table and Osimhen has been a big part of that success, with 16 goals in 17 league appearances

    Italian publication Gazzetta dello Sport report that Napoli are expecting bids of €120m (£107m) from Manchester United and Chelsea in the summer transfer window

    There may well be interest in Osimhen from elsewhere as well, with Bayern Munich and Real Madrid also touted in the report as potential suitors

    If any Premier League clubs do fork out £107m for the striker then it would break the British transfer record which Chelsea just set by spending £105m on midfielder Enzo Fernandez from Benfica

    Napoli are enjoying a stunning season, currently 13 points clear of Inter Milan at the top of the Serie A table and Osimhen has been a big part of that success, with 16 goals in 17 league appearances

    Italian publication Gazzetta dello Sport report that Napoli are expecting bids of €120m (£107m) from Manchester United and Chelsea in the summer transfer window

  • JPJ DETECTS FRAUD DRIVING LICENCE SCAM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/jpj-detects-fraud-driving-licence-scam

    02/06/2023, 07:07

    71.43% Shortened!

    JPJ deputy director-general (management) M

    “The licence is not a legitimate one

    It is an offence committed by scammers whereby this ‘licence’ has no record nor does it exist in the JPJ system

    “If a driver obtains a licence by this means, he or she doesn’t actually own a valid licence and needs to remember that it is fake,” he said, Bernama reported

    “Some victims make payments and are issued with what is a fake licence

    Road Transport Department (JPJ)

    ['drive', 'licence', 'say', 'transport', 'department']

    Those with information can contact the Dang Wangi district police headquarters at 03-2600 2222 or KL police hotline at 03-2115 9999 or any nearest police station

    The incident occurred at Jalan Cendana in Kampung Baru.

  • 'DECENT' YEAR PREDICTED FOR PENANG

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/decent-year-predicted-for-penang

    02/06/2023, 07:06

    80.0% Shortened!

    This forecast was made during the annual Chneah Hoay (flame-watching) ceremony at the Hai Choo Soo Temple in Tanjung Tokong

    This indicates that the economy will pick up towards the end of the year

    In 2022, the committee decided not to hold it for a second year running due to crowd control concerns

    Before the Chneah Hoay ceremony each year, the statue of Tua Pek Kong is brought from the Poh Hock Seah Temple in Armenian Street to the Hai Choo Soo Temple

    And once every 12 years in the Year of the Tiger, this will be marked with a grand procession

    Year of the Water Rabbit

    ['hai', 'choo', 'soo', 'temple', 'penang']

    This forecast was made during the annual Chneah Hoay (flame-watching) ceremony at the Hai Choo Soo Temple in Tanjung Tokong

    This indicates that the economy will pick up towards the end of the year

    In 2022, the committee decided not to hold it for a second year running due to crowd control concerns

    Before the Chneah Hoay ceremony each year, the statue of Tua Pek Kong is brought from the Poh Hock Seah Temple in Armenian Street to the Hai Choo Soo Temple

    And once every 12 years in the Year of the Tiger, this will be marked with a grand procession

    Year of the Water Rabbit

    ['hai', 'choo', 'soo', 'temple', 'penang']



  • ZAFRUL: NO RECESSION EXPECTED

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/zafrul-no-recession-expected

    02/06/2023, 07:06

    61.11% Shortened!

    Tengku Zafrul also said although the country’s economic growth this year was projected to be moderate compared with 2022, he was optimistic that Malaysia would not face a recession

    The definition of a recession is two successive quarters of negative GDP (gross domestic product) growth

    “Bank Negara, the International Monetary Fund, and the World Bank have projected Malaysia will continue achieving positive economic growth in the 3% to 5% range

    “I don’t think we are going to face a recession

    However, compared with the growth achieved in 2022, there will be some moderation

    “We need to take this opportunity to ensure all of our growth engines keep firing, especially in trade and investment,” he told Bernama during his recent visit to Penang

    Tengku Datuk Seri Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz

    ['tengku', 'zafrul', 'say', 'economic', 'growth']

    Tengku Zafrul also said although the country’s economic growth this year was projected to be moderate compared with 2022, he was optimistic that Malaysia would not face a recession

    The definition of a recession is two successive quarters of negative GDP (gross domestic product) growth

    “Bank Negara, the International Monetary Fund, and the World Bank have projected Malaysia will continue achieving positive economic growth in the 3% to 5% range

    “I don’t think we are going to face a recession

    However, compared with the growth achieved in 2022, there will be some moderation

    “We need to take this opportunity to ensure all of our growth engines keep firing, especially in trade and investment,” he told Bernama during his recent visit to Penang

    Tengku Datuk Seri Zafrul Tengku Abdul Aziz

    ['tengku', 'zafrul', 'say', 'economic', 'growth']



  • HIGH PRICES NOT PERMANENT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/high-prices-not-permanent

    02/06/2023, 07:06

    75.0% Shortened!

    Kuala Lumpur Vegetable Wholesalers’ Association president Wong Keng Fatt said wet weather had driven up the price of several vegetables by between 70% and 80%

    “Heavy rain since early January have seen vegetable prices soaring,” he said yesterday

    Federation of Vegetable Farmers Associations president Lim Ser Kwee said he expected the price of tomatoes, okra, bitter gourd and cucumber to stabilise in two or three weeks

    Cameron Highlands Vegetable Growers Association deputy president Lau Weng Soow said the price of sawi (green mustard), lettuce and siew pak choy (bok choy) had not gone up

    I believe production will return to a stable level after the rainy season,” he said

    According to the Federal Agricultural Marketing Authority (Fama), the rising vegetable prices were temporary

    ['farmer', 'price', 'vegetable', 'due', 'season']

    02/06/2023

    Many big tech firms, which flourished during the COVID-19 pandemic due to low interest rates, are now reigning in their spending amid a weak economy

    Observers said big tech shares might be able to claw back at least some of the trillions of dollars of value lost last year.  This comes following thousands of layoffs at tech giants over the past year, after a pandemic-led hiring boom left them flabby in a sluggish economy

    The tech firm expects this year’s expenses to be less than previously forecast, which has prompted a jump in its share price

    That was probably the biggest shocking news to them.” During the COVID-19 pandemic, some of the tech sector’s biggest players boomed, doubling their workforces in just a few years

    “Fuelling that growth was the fact that interest rates were so low in the United States,” said Dr Arun Sundararajan, professor of technology, operations and statistics at New York University.  “So it wasn’t just the big tech companies

    For now, tech companies are looking at ways to get back on track.  Market watchers believe artificial intelligence and machine learning are the next drivers of the tech industry

  • LOCAL GOVERNMENT DEVELOPMENT MINISTER ANNOUNCES RM40M ALLOCATION FOR PENANG

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/06/local-government-development-minister-announces-rm40m-allocation-for-penang/53652

    02/06/2023

    70.0% Shortened!

    Out of the RM40 million, a total RM24 million is for the redevelopment of the Bukit Mertajam market while the remaining RM16 million is for the maintenance fund of stratified public housing in Penang

    Labelling it as a “big angpao” for Penang, he said the RM16 million was an increase of 70 per cent in the federal government’s allocation last year for the maintenance of public housing in Penang

    “Last year, a total RM9 million was allocated to Penang for the maintenance fund of public housing here so this year, we have decided to increase it by 70 per cent to RM16 million,” he said in a press conference at the official launch of a back lane upgrading project in Armenian Street here

    This morning, in his visit to the Bukit Mertajam market site, Nga had already announced the allocation of RM24 million for the redevelopment of the market

    “It will have a market component, multi-storey carpark, a creative centre, a heritage gallery and it will also feature upgraded back lanes like the back lane here in Armenian Street,” he said

    The Armenian Street back lane is one of the 24 back lanes, covering a total 7km, that were upgraded by the Penang Island City Council (MBPP) at a cost of RM2.589 million

    ['million', 'penang', 'market', 'say', 'back']

  • ANWAR CLAPS BACK AT ‘HYPOCRITES’ WHO CRITICISE NURUL IZZAH’S APPOINTMENT AS FINANCIAL AND ECONOMIC ADVISER

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/06/anwar-claps-back-at-hypocrites-who-criticise-nurul-izzahs-appointment-as-financial-and-economic-adviser/53668

    02/06/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 6 — Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim clapped back at corrupt naysayers who voiced their displeasure at the appointment of Nurul Izzah Anwar as his financial adviser

    He said Nurul Izzah will not use the position to enrich herself and her family unlike those who came before him who he said had awarded contracts to their cronies and family members to the tune of billions of ringgit

    Speaking during a press conference at PKR headquarters, Anwar reiterated that Nurul was not being paid for her services and her role does not enable her to dish out government contracts at will

    “I respect the views of concerned citizens who seem to express their concern in the event that position is used or abused to benefit family members, that I can assure you will not happen under my administration,” he added

    Nurul Izzah is Anwar’s daughter and the former Permatang Pauh MP

    These accusations prompted Anwar to defend her appointment, saying it was not necessary for Nurul Izzah to have formal qualifications in finance and economics in order to advise him on such matters.

    ['anwar', 'nurul', 'izzah', 'say', 'position']

    Raphinha got the third goal in the 79th minute with a point-blank strike from an Alba cross

    - Harry's greatest hits! How Kane became Spurs' all-time scorer Following several loan spells, Kane finally settled into the Spurs first-team in 2014 and netted his first Premier League goal in a 5-1 victory over Sunderland

    From the start of the 2014-15 campaign to the end of last season, Kane has averaged 23 Premier League goals a season

    In that time, Kane has won the Premier League Golden Boot award three times (2015-16, 2016-17, 2020-21), as well as earning the Playmaker of the Season award for the player with the most assists in 2020-21

    The reductions amount to about 5% of Dell’s global workforce, according to a company spokesperson

    Dell generates about 55% of its revenue from PCs

    Dell reported a 6% sales decline in the period ended Oct

    But Zelenskiy remained silent, while Reznikov said on Sunday he had heard nothing

    Ukraine's defence ministry did not respond to a request for comment and Reuters could not immediately reach Reznikov or Budanov

    then it will be officially communicated." Reznikov said on Sunday that any decision was up to Zelenskiy but that he had heard nothing about a transfer

    There was no immediate response from Ukraine, which has disputed other Russian battlefield reports

    02/06/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    Monday, 06 Feb 2023

    Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim, in a post on his Twitter account, said he and his wife Datuk Seri Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail were saddened to hear about the demise of Musharraf

    "Malaysia extends our heartfelt condolences and may Allah the Almighty give strength to the family of General Pervez Musharraf," he said

    Musharraf died in the United Arab Emirates yesterday at the age of 79

    Musharraf, who seized power in 1999 in a bloodless coup, resigned as president in 2008 in the face of impeachment by Parliament

    Musharraf's ailment was identified as amyloidosis

  • MELAKA HERITAGE SITE IN A STATE OF NEGLECT

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/06/melaka-heritage-site-in-a-state-of-neglect

    02/06/2023

    70.83% Shortened!

    The site near Sungai Melaka was a Portuguese chapel and is located in the heart of the historic city, not far from other historical sites

    The site was either destroyed or allowed to fall into ruin during the Dutch occupation of Melaka in 1641 and was subsequently taken over by St Peter's Church

    However, a check on Sunday (Feb 5) night found that the site has been left to deteriorate and the surroundings are unlit

    A 10-minute observation of the site found those gathering at the river walkway were not aware of the site's history

    She said Perzim was willing to do its part to preserve and promote the site if a request is made by the custodian of the site

    "We are willing to work together with stakeholders to preserve the site and other historical icons," she said on Monday (Feb 6)

    "The site has strong tourism value if we can rehabilitate and preserve it as a heritage site

    ['melaka', 'ruin', 'heritage', 'site', 'state']

    The site near Sungai Melaka was a Portuguese chapel and is located in the heart of the historic city, not far from other historical sites

    The site was either destroyed or allowed to fall into ruin during the Dutch occupation of Melaka in 1641 and was subsequently taken over by St Peter's Church

    However, a check on Sunday (Feb 5) night found that the site has been left to deteriorate and the surroundings are unlit

    A 10-minute observation of the site found those gathering at the river walkway were not aware of the site's history

    She said Perzim was willing to do its part to preserve and promote the site if a request is made by the custodian of the site

    "We are willing to work together with stakeholders to preserve the site and other historical icons," she said on Monday (Feb 6)

    "The site has strong tourism value if we can rehabilitate and preserve it as a heritage site

    ['melaka', 'ruin', 'heritage', 'site', 'state']

    Ahmad added that several measures are also considered to ease congestion at the Causeway

    He said that one of these measures is the increase in the number of lanes from one lane to two lanes for lorries that are not carrying any loads

  • MALAYSIA'S SUBANG AIRPORT TO BE REDEVELOPED INTO 'REGIONAL AVIATION HUB', SAYS TRANSPORT MINISTER

    https://www.channelnewsasia.com/asia/malaysia-subang-airport-redevelopment-plan-regional-aviation-hub-aerospace-3256861

    02/06/2023

    45.45% Shortened!

    The Skypark terminal at the Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport in Subang, suburban Kuala Lumpur on May 12, 2018

    Speaking to local media, Mr Loke said the plan will see the airport - known formally as the Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport - handle up to eight million passengers annually.  “I think this is a major game-changer as far as Subang Airport is concerned,” Mr Loke was quoted as saying by Malay Mail.  Mr Loke told local media that there were seven areas that the redevelopment plan will focus on

    These include the introduction of commercial jet passenger flights for general aviation, business aviation, urban air mobility as well as regional commercial flight operations among others

    “When the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) began operations in 1998, (Subang Airport) gradually winded down its operations and jet engines were disallowed from operating

    “One of the biggest policy changes is that the government is now allowing narrow-body jets to operate again in this airport, but for this to happen there must be redevelopment (of the airport terminals),” he said, as quoted by Malay Mail.  The online portal added that Mr Loke stressed that Subang Airport’s redevelopment is not aimed at replacing KLIA in Sepang, but to transform it into a city airport that complements the international airport.  Just last month, local media reported Tourism Minister Tiong King Sing urging the Home Ministry to improve wait times at KLIA for incoming travellers, citing two-hour-long waits at its immigration counters.  "If Malaysia wants to welcome tourists and make the country a competitive destination of choice, we need to solve this problem as soon as possible to avoid the image of the Immigration Department being tarnished,” he reportedly said.  He said that the delays at the immigration counters reveal the outdated inspection procedure at KLIA and suggested that airport authorities deploy multilingual staff as well as for the facial recognition system to be extended to international visitors.  "The facial recognition system used by the Immigration Department should also be extended to all international visitors, not just limited to those with long-term passes to facilitate the clearance process," he was quoted as saying by New Straits Times.

    Be among the first to know the Breaking news

    ['airport', 'subang', 'aviation', 'plan', 'loke']

    The Skypark terminal at the Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport in Subang, suburban Kuala Lumpur on May 12, 2018

    Speaking to local media, Mr Loke said the plan will see the airport - known formally as the Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah Airport - handle up to eight million passengers annually.  “I think this is a major game-changer as far as Subang Airport is concerned,” Mr Loke was quoted as saying by Malay Mail.  Mr Loke told local media that there were seven areas that the redevelopment plan will focus on

    These include the introduction of commercial jet passenger flights for general aviation, business aviation, urban air mobility as well as regional commercial flight operations among others

    “When the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA) began operations in 1998, (Subang Airport) gradually winded down its operations and jet engines were disallowed from operating

    “One of the biggest policy changes is that the government is now allowing narrow-body jets to operate again in this airport, but for this to happen there must be redevelopment (of the airport terminals),” he said, as quoted by Malay Mail.  The online portal added that Mr Loke stressed that Subang Airport’s redevelopment is not aimed at replacing KLIA in Sepang, but to transform it into a city airport that complements the international airport.  Just last month, local media reported Tourism Minister Tiong King Sing urging the Home Ministry to improve wait times at KLIA for incoming travellers, citing two-hour-long waits at its immigration counters.  "If Malaysia wants to welcome tourists and make the country a competitive destination of choice, we need to solve this problem as soon as possible to avoid the image of the Immigration Department being tarnished,” he reportedly said.  He said that the delays at the immigration counters reveal the outdated inspection procedure at KLIA and suggested that airport authorities deploy multilingual staff as well as for the facial recognition system to be extended to international visitors.  "The facial recognition system used by the Immigration Department should also be extended to all international visitors, not just limited to those with long-term passes to facilitate the clearance process," he was quoted as saying by New Straits Times.

    ['airport', 'subang', 'aviation', 'plan', 'loke']



  • HOW MUCH WILL CAPITAL GAINS TAX ON REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT PROPERTY

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/much-capital-gains-tax-real-140043631.html

    89.29% Shortened!

    How Are Capital Gains Taxed? The IRS taxes short-term capital gains as standard income, meaning your income tax bracket will determine your tax rate

    Your income determines your capital gains tax rates

    The sale results in a short-term capital gain, and your income is $115,000 when you file taxes

    In addition, single filers making $125,000 or more annually will pay a net investment income tax of 3.8% on capital gains from real estate

    Fortunately, multiple deductions and tax strategies can lower your tax burden

    Tips on Capital Gains Tax on Real Estate Investment Property You can make the most of your real estate investments by familiarizing yourself with relevant tax laws

    ['real', 'estate', 'investment', 'capital', 'gain']

    How Are Capital Gains Taxed? The IRS taxes short-term capital gains as standard income, meaning your income tax bracket will determine your tax rate

    Your income determines your capital gains tax rates

    The sale results in a short-term capital gain, and your income is $115,000 when you file taxes

    In addition, single filers making $125,000 or more annually will pay a net investment income tax of 3.8% on capital gains from real estate

    Fortunately, multiple deductions and tax strategies can lower your tax burden

    Tips on Capital Gains Tax on Real Estate Investment Property You can make the most of your real estate investments by familiarizing yourself with relevant tax laws

    ['real', 'estate', 'investment', 'capital', 'gain']

    There was a time not so long ago when playing Rashford through the middle would induce a shake of the head from United supporters, but right now the 25-year-old looks like the first name on the teamsheet for all three attacking positions

    There's no doubt he is at his best coming off the left for Manchester United, but having spent much of his career pigeonholed in that role, he has shown he can do it all this season

    United were left desperately hanging on for all three points and it turned out Rashford's 19th club goal of the season in his 32nd game proved to be more important than it had looked at the time

    Rashford switched back to the left after Jeffrey Schlupp had cut the deficit and he had to do his fair share of defensive work in the final 15 minutes when the United goal was under siege at times

    All they can do is keep winning and with Rashford in this form, they have every chance of doing that

    It's just a shame he can't play three roles at once

    "On the issue of recession, I am optimistic there will not be (one)...the definition of a recession is two successive quarters of negative GDP (gross domestic product) growth

    "Bank Negara Malaysia, the International Monetary Fund, and the World Bank have projected for Malaysia to continue achieving positive economic growth in the 3%-5% range

    "I do not think we are going to face a recession

    "Therefore we need to take this opportunity to ensure all of our engines of growth keep firing especially in terms of trade and investment," he told Bernama during his recent visit to Penang

    "We need to attract high quality investment that can provide jobs to our people and increase the national income

    https://www.express.co.uk/life-style/cars/1726514/petrol-diesel-filling-station-mistake-car-damage-warning

    02/05/2023, 17:04

    71.43% Shortened!

    Some people believe that having less petrol or diesel in a vehicle makes it lighter and therefore more fuel efficient

    Dorry Potter, car and scrappage expert for National Scrap Car, claimed that it is “a lot better” to fill up the car when refuelling

    “When you are just topping up your fuel by a small amount each time the oil deposits and bad quality stuff which falls to the bottom of the fuel tank gets pumped around the vehicle for a prolonged period

    “For an unleaded vehicle this would just need refuelling but for a diesel engine, it could lead to your fuel pump sending air through your fuel system instead of gas

    Many supermarkets and branded garages will usually have a few different grades of premium fuel for both petrol and diesel

    Over a 50-mile journey, drivers could save 26p in an average diesel car

  • IGP’S STATEMENT ON DRESS CODE AT POLICE STATIONS ‘FLAWED, IRRESPONSIBLE’, SAYS BANDAR KUCHING MP

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/05/igps-statement-on-dress-code-at-police-stations-flawed-irresponsible-says-bandar-kuching-mp/53510

    02/05/2023, 14:04

    70.0% Shortened!

    The Democratic Action Party lawmaker said it is the responsibility of the police force to serve the community, and not to “moral police the community” especially when it comes to ensuring the safety and security of the people

    Dr Yii said it must be the first assumption that all cases is an emergency, whether “life or death” when people walk into the police station

    He asserted that people should not be barred from entering police stations as no one would go to the police station to lodge reports unless they have to, as they need police assistance

    He wondered what message the police want to send to the people whom they are meant to protect

    He said it is thus the responsibility of the police to uphold that very law of the country and not impose any other regulations at the police station that may hinder justice

    Thus, the police have to carry out their duty,” he added

    ['police', 'sani', 'dress', 'station', 'say']

    The Democratic Action Party lawmaker said it is the responsibility of the police force to serve the community, and not to “moral police the community” especially when it comes to ensuring the safety and security of the people

    Dr Yii said it must be the first assumption that all cases is an emergency, whether “life or death” when people walk into the police station

    He asserted that people should not be barred from entering police stations as no one would go to the police station to lodge reports unless they have to, as they need police assistance

    He wondered what message the police want to send to the people whom they are meant to protect

    He said it is thus the responsibility of the police to uphold that very law of the country and not impose any other regulations at the police station that may hinder justice

    Thus, the police have to carry out their duty,” he added

    ['police', 'sani', 'dress', 'station', 'say']

    53.85% Shortened!

    Bentong MP Young Syefura Othman said no one would go to a police station unless necessary and everyone should be allowed access to lodge a police report without being judged for their attire

    “Those who go to a police station are those in need of help

    Their attire should not be an issue

    “PDRM’s job is to safeguard peace and security, not be the rakyat’s moral police,” she said in a statement

    Earlier this week, news portal Free Malaysia Today reported a woman complaining that she had been denied entry into a Selangor district police station over the length of her trousers

    The woman whom the news portal identified only as “Karen” was said to have gone to the Kajang police station to report her car collision with a truck, only to be told by a policeman that she could not enter as her trousers were above her knees

  • CHINESE SCIENTISTS ‘DEVELOP’ HYPERSONIC GENERATOR THAN CAN POWER MILITARY LASERS, RAIL GUNS & HIGH ENERGY MICROWAVE WEAPONS

    https://eurasiantimes.com/chinese-scientists-develop-hypersonic-generator-than-can/

    02/05/2023, 12:05

    75.0% Shortened!

    The generator system triggers explosions that transform the gas into increasingly fast plasma

    The energy of the plasma is subsequently converted into highly powerful electricity.  The report said that the technology could power military lasers, rail guns, and microwave weapons, which consume considerable electricity

    It is a device that resembles a tube that can capture energy from quickly flowing ions and transform it into electricity.  The MHD generator addresses some of the most significant challenges in creating and using pulsed energy weapons, which unleash massive energy bursts to destroy a target.  In contrast to conventional combustion, a method of producing electricity that usually necessitates a sizable, sophisticated facility with generators, the MHD generator can produce high-power electricity inside a simple and relatively compact system.  The report noted that among its many exceptional benefits, the MHD generator has no revolving components

    The energy can be directly transferred to the load without a high-power switch

    China is reportedly working on a high-power microwave weapon that may be used to disrupt satellites and aircraft

    Zhang’s team claimed their generator system could produce one-gigawatt power with just five cubic meters (177 cubic feet) of hypersonic plasma

    ['researcher', 'generator', 'hypersonic', 'power', 'weapon']

    The generator system triggers explosions that transform the gas into increasingly fast plasma

    The energy of the plasma is subsequently converted into highly powerful electricity.  The report said that the technology could power military lasers, rail guns, and microwave weapons, which consume considerable electricity

    It is a device that resembles a tube that can capture energy from quickly flowing ions and transform it into electricity.  The MHD generator addresses some of the most significant challenges in creating and using pulsed energy weapons, which unleash massive energy bursts to destroy a target.  In contrast to conventional combustion, a method of producing electricity that usually necessitates a sizable, sophisticated facility with generators, the MHD generator can produce high-power electricity inside a simple and relatively compact system.  The report noted that among its many exceptional benefits, the MHD generator has no revolving components

    The energy can be directly transferred to the load without a high-power switch

    China is reportedly working on a high-power microwave weapon that may be used to disrupt satellites and aircraft

    Zhang’s team claimed their generator system could produce one-gigawatt power with just five cubic meters (177 cubic feet) of hypersonic plasma

    https://www.thestar.com.my/aseanplus/aseanplus-news/2023/02/05/china-expresses-039strong-dissatisfaction039-over-us-shooting-down-balloon

    02/05/2023, 12:05

    62.5% Shortened!

    Sunday, 05 Feb 2023

    A jet flies by a suspected Chinese spy balloon as it floats off the coast in Surfside Beach, South Carolina

    "China expresses strong dissatisfaction and protests against the use of force by the United States to attack the unmanned civilian airship," Beijing's foreign ministry said in a statement, adding that it would "reserve the right to make further necessary responses"

    That led Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday to scrap a rare trip to Beijing designed to contain rising US-China tensions

    After initial hesitation, Beijing admitted ownership of the "airship", but said it was a weather balloon that had been blown off course

    Beijing said the United States "insisted on using force, clearly overreacting and seriously violating international practice"

    ['chinese', 'balloon', 'beijing', 'united', 'state']

  • COVID-19 STILL AN EMERGENCY, SAYS WHO

    https://www.thestar.com.my/lifestyle/health/2023/02/05/covid-19-still-an-emergency-says-who

    02/05/2023, 12:04

    77.78% Shortened!

    Tedros has expressed his disappointment that many vulnerable people remain un- or under-vaccinated, and lack access to the drugs needed to treat severe Covid-19

    — AFP Three years to the day after the World Health Organization (WHO) sounded the highest level of global alert over Covid-19, it said on Jan 30 (2023) that the pandemic remains an international emergency

    In mid-January (2023), almost 40,000 weekly Covid deaths were being reported – more than half of them in China

    It was only after Tedros described the worsening Covid situation as a pandemic on March 11, 2020, that many countries realised the danger

    “The Covid-19 pandemic should be a wake-up call for the global community to prepare now for the next health crisis,” said Red Cross secretary-general Jagan Chapagain

  • TOYOTA HILUX GR SPORT TRANSFORMED INTO AN ADVENTURE-READY MOTORHOME

    https://www.carscoops.com/2023/02/toyota-hilux-gr-sport-transformed-into-an-adventure-ready-motorhome/

    02/05/2023

    78.57% Shortened!

    The BR75 builds on the dual-cab pickup by Toyota, replacing the rear bed with a large structure that has a longer rear overhang and an aerodynamically-shaped extension above the cabin

    Another cool feature is that besides the regular-sized door on the side and the large tailgate, the living area can also be accessed from the cabin of the vehicle

    Last but not least, the vehicle also comes with a second room at the back

    The vehicle comes equipped with an 85-liter water tank, another 20-liter clean water tank, and a 45-liter drain tank

    Finally, besides the power outlets inside the living area, there are two external power outlets at the back for various electronic devices

    The cheapest one is based on the Toyota Hilux Z and starts from 10,980,000 ($83,931), while the full-spec model based on the Toyota Hilux GR Sport is priced at ¥12,450,000 ($95,121)

    ['br75', 'car', 'base', 'toyota', 'hilux']

  • REPORT: 147 WANITA UMNO DIVISION HEADS WANT SHAHRIZAT TO RETURN

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/05/report-147-wanita-umno-division-heads-want-shahrizat-to-return/53486

    02/05/2023, 11:05

    52.94% Shortened!

    Wanita Umno Kota Melaka chief Datuk Haryaty Hamdzah was quoted as saying in a report by Utusan Malaysia that the collective decision was made during a meeting with Shahrizat herself most recently

    “A majority of us have considered requesting Tan Sri Shahrizat to return and helm Wanita Umno after we met with her face-to-face

    She later stressed that the rejection of the motion proposed by Wanita Umno delegates to have the wing’s chief and division posts go uncontested is proof of the grassroots’ wish for a new leadership

    “The motion’s failure is proof that the grassroots want a new leadership

    Following Barisan Nasional’s defeat in the 14th general election, Shahrizat announced her intention to not defend her position in the Umno party election that year and said she had relinquished all her positions in the Malay nationalist party, including at the branch, division and national levels

    Shahrizat helmed the women’s ministry from 2001 to 2012

    Incumbent Wanita Umno chief Datuk Seri Noraini Ahmad, who is also Parit Sulong MP, has recently indicated her intention to defend her post

    Elections for the Umno divisions and its supreme council will be held simultaneously on March 18

    ['wanita', 'umno', 'division', 'chief', 'shahrizat']

    02/05/2023, 10:04

    Still, officials on Saturday appeared to play down the balloon's impact on US national security

    The Pentagon assesses that this balloon was part of a fleet of Chinese spy balloons

  • CASEMIRO HAS PLAYED ENTIRE CAREER WITH INCORRECT NAME ON SHIRT - INCLUDING MAN UTD

    https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/football/news/man-utd-casemiro-wrong-name-29135905

    02/05/2023, 09:06

    70.0% Shortened!

    Brazil international midfielder Casemiro has played more than 500 career games in four different countries, and has done so with his name spelled wrong on the back of his shirt Manchester United midfielder Casemiro wears the wrong name on the back of his shirt, and has done so for his entire career

    The Brazilian midfielder, who joined United from Real Madrid over the summer, has Casemiro - with an E - on the back of his shirt

    However, his name is Carlos Henrique Casimiro - with an I

    "So the thing is, my name is Carlos Henrique Casimiro, with an 'I' there," Casemiro told Football Focus

    "I remember that I played a game for Sao Paulo and they got my name wrong

    So the name stuck, but my name is Carlos Henrique Casimiro

    ['casemiro', 'game', 'name', 'back', 'united']

  • BERSIH WELCOMES PERIKATAN’S SHADOW CABINET AS A STEP FORWARD TO DEMOCRACY

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/05/bersih-welcomes-perikatans-shadow-cabinet-as-a-step-forward-to-democracy/53467

    02/05/2023, 09:04

    57.14% Shortened!

    The group also hoped that the Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim would welcome the formation of the shadow cabinet and take the opportunity to strengthen political stability

    “At the same time, the PN shadow cabinet should pay a courtesy visit to the cabinet before Parliament convenes as a sign of civilised inter-party competition,” it said

    Moreover, Bersih said the unity government led by Anwar should officially recognise the formation of the shadow cabinet in Parliament with a law that stipulates the functions, rights and facilities for the shadow cabinet

    This is to allow the shadow cabinet to perform robust and professional check and balance against the government, instead of resorting to emotional and populist rhetoric

    Thus, the group said the recognition of the shadow cabinet should include a swearing-in ceremony for shadow ministers at Istana Negara as a Loyal Opposition to the prime minister

    “There should be an allowance to shadow ministers that is one third of a minister’s salary, similarly to Australia’s system, and allocation of a salaried research officer for each shadow minister with the relevant expertise related to the shadow minister’s portfolio

    ['formation', 'shadow', 'cabinet', 'government', 'say']

    The group also hoped that the Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim would welcome the formation of the shadow cabinet and take the opportunity to strengthen political stability

    “At the same time, the PN shadow cabinet should pay a courtesy visit to the cabinet before Parliament convenes as a sign of civilised inter-party competition,” it said

    Moreover, Bersih said the unity government led by Anwar should officially recognise the formation of the shadow cabinet in Parliament with a law that stipulates the functions, rights and facilities for the shadow cabinet

    This is to allow the shadow cabinet to perform robust and professional check and balance against the government, instead of resorting to emotional and populist rhetoric

    Thus, the group said the recognition of the shadow cabinet should include a swearing-in ceremony for shadow ministers at Istana Negara as a Loyal Opposition to the prime minister

    “There should be an allowance to shadow ministers that is one third of a minister’s salary, similarly to Australia’s system, and allocation of a salaried research officer for each shadow minister with the relevant expertise related to the shadow minister’s portfolio

    02/05/2023, 08:05

    She said this was based on information from the Batu Caves temple management

    Meanwhile, she said some 1,888 police personnel would be deployed to ensure that the celebration at Batu Caves goes on smoothly

    Kuala Lumpur police chief Comm Datuk Azmi Abu Kassim, in a statement issued yesterday, said 682 police officers and personnel had been deployed to facilitate the chariot procession from the Sri Maha Mariammam temple at Jalan Tun HS Lee to the Subramaniam temple in Batu Caves

    He also urged those with information on any criminal activity around the festive events to contact the Kuala Lumpur police hotline at 03-2115 9999 or the nearest police station

  • CELEBRATION IN PENANG MAKES A GRAND COMEBACK

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/05/celebration-in-penang-makes-a-grand-comeback

    02/05/2023, 08:05

    62.5% Shortened!

    The golden chariot took off at about 6.30am from Sri Maha Mariammam Temple in Lebuh Queen before making its way to the Arulmigu Sree Balathandayuthapani Waterfall Hilltop Temple

    At about 7.50am, the silver chariot departed from the Nagarathar Kovil Veedu Temple in Lebuh Penang, heading over to the Nattukotai Chettiar Temple on Jalan Kebun Bunga

    The silver chariot ferried the statue of Lord Murugan while the golden chariot carried his vel (spear)

    Despite a slight delay, the processions went on without any untoward incidents, with both chariots travelling along Lebuh Chulia, Lebuh Victoria, Jalan Dr Lim Chwee Leong, Jalan CY Choy, Jalan Magazine, Jalan Datuk Keramat, Jalan Utama and ending at Jalan Kebun Bunga

    There were shouts of “Vel, vel, vetri (victorious)” or “Vel, vel Muruga (Glory unto Muruga)” echoing loudly

    On the return journey tomorrow, the golden chariot will leave the Arulmigu Sree Balathandayuthapani Waterfall Hilltop Temple at 6pm, while the silver chariot is expected to leave the Nattukotai Chettiar Temple an hour later.

    ['along', 'chariot', 'temple', 'lebuh', 'silver']

    The golden chariot took off at about 6.30am from Sri Maha Mariammam Temple in Lebuh Queen before making its way to the Arulmigu Sree Balathandayuthapani Waterfall Hilltop Temple

    At about 7.50am, the silver chariot departed from the Nagarathar Kovil Veedu Temple in Lebuh Penang, heading over to the Nattukotai Chettiar Temple on Jalan Kebun Bunga

    The silver chariot ferried the statue of Lord Murugan while the golden chariot carried his vel (spear)

    Despite a slight delay, the processions went on without any untoward incidents, with both chariots travelling along Lebuh Chulia, Lebuh Victoria, Jalan Dr Lim Chwee Leong, Jalan CY Choy, Jalan Magazine, Jalan Datuk Keramat, Jalan Utama and ending at Jalan Kebun Bunga

    There were shouts of “Vel, vel, vetri (victorious)” or “Vel, vel Muruga (Glory unto Muruga)” echoing loudly

    On the return journey tomorrow, the golden chariot will leave the Arulmigu Sree Balathandayuthapani Waterfall Hilltop Temple at 6pm, while the silver chariot is expected to leave the Nattukotai Chettiar Temple an hour later.

    ['along', 'chariot', 'temple', 'lebuh', 'silver']

    The Liverpool manager admitted to being concerned after his side's latest defeat to Wolves Follow the latest transfer news and more with our LFC newsletter We have more newsletters Jurgen Klopp admits he is hugely concerned by Liverpool's form as he reiterated how last season's 63-game campaign has impacted proceedings this term

    How can I not be concerned? "I cannot sit here and say it’s all OK and we did well

    I was asked outside if it’s because of last season, 63 games

    "Yes, of course, it’s clear that [last season] has influenced the first part of the season, but how long do we want to suffer from that? It’s February now

    Wolves were a clear better side for 12 minutes, and maybe the last 10 when they were 3-0 up and the ball was their friend again

    "But in between, we were really in the game and especially in the second half we put them under real pressure, against a team full of confidence with momentum

    City will need to press the attack high up the pitch and draw Kane into coming deeper But City will however take solace in the fact that the 29-year-old doesn't actually have a great record against the champions

    Police have issued many tips on how to protect vehicles that are at high risk of theft

    It’s important to remember that State Farm and Progressive are only limiting their sales of “new” insurance policies for high-risk Kia and Hyundai vehicles

    02/05/2023

    70.0% Shortened!

    In Sean Dyche’s first match as Everton boss, the victory lifted the Merseyside club out of the relegation zone in their conquest for Premier League survival

    An affair which turned feisty towards the end, Arsenal never truly got going and rarely troubled Jordan Pickford

    There were a few sporadic bright sparks in attack here and there, but Arsenal were unable to penetrate the Everton defence which meant they fell to their second league defeat of the season

    The match was always going to be a difficult one to go to – Arsenal’s recent history at Goodison Park shows as such – and the instant impact Dyche has had was clear from the get-go

    Arsenal struggled against the Everton press and were unable to play through it to the standard that we have become so accustomed to seeing this season

    Arsenal still have a long way to go, and this match can be passed off as a blip, but it was an opportunity to advance further away from Manchester City; one that should have been taken

    Sign up to the Liverpool.com newsletter here — it only takes a few seconds! Sooner or later, Klopp and his recruitment team must decide to be ruthless if they want to get Liverpool back to the pinnacle of the game

    Right now, Liverpool has one of the oldest squads in the Premier League

    It's clear, if FSG is not going to sell the club, Liverpool is going to have to operate on a sell-to-buy basis and the best way to raise funds is to sell some of Liverpool's players entering their 30s when they still have some value left

    That is what Klopp may just have to do, especially if his Liverpool team continues to perform in the same way they have since the start of the year.

  • YES PREPAID FT5G UNLIMITED MONTHLY HOTSPOT QUOTA IS NOW 12GB

    https://www.lowyat.net/2023/293576/yes-5g-prepaid-unlimited-monthly-hotspot-quota-change/

    02/05/2023

    50.0% Shortened!

    YTL Communications has made some changes to the hotspot quota for its Yes Prepaid FT5G Unlimited plan

    When customers utilize the hotspot function with a 5G connection, this quota would not be affected

    However, if you visit these sections on the website – Yes Prepaid Plans, Yes Prepaid FT5G Plan’s FAQ, and Yes First To 5G Campaign Terms and Conditions (dated 3 February 2023), the combined hotspot quota is listed as 12GB

    The 12GB hotspot quota has also been stated in the description of the FT5G RM30 Unlimited add-on inside the MyYes app

    As for other parts of both the Prepaid FT5G Unlimited plan and FT5G RM30 Unlimited add-on, they remained the same including unlimited 5G for on-device usage and unlimited 4G on-device data albeit the speed is capped at 7Mbps

    The same goes for unlimited on-net & off-net domestic voice calls, and unlimited on-net domestic SMS although to send off-net domestic SMS, it costs RM0.09 per message

    ['hotspot', 'quota', 'yes', 'prepaid', 'ft5g']

    When customers utilize the hotspot function with a 5G connection, this quota would not be affected

    However, if you visit these sections on the website – Yes Prepaid Plans, Yes Prepaid FT5G Plan’s FAQ, and Yes First To 5G Campaign Terms and Conditions (dated 3 February 2023), the combined hotspot quota is listed as 12GB

    The 12GB hotspot quota has also been stated in the description of the FT5G RM30 Unlimited add-on inside the MyYes app

    As for other parts of both the Prepaid FT5G Unlimited plan and FT5G RM30 Unlimited add-on, they remained the same including unlimited 5G for on-device usage and unlimited 4G on-device data albeit the speed is capped at 7Mbps

    The same goes for unlimited on-net & off-net domestic voice calls, and unlimited on-net domestic SMS although to send off-net domestic SMS, it costs RM0.09 per message

  • ROAD TRANSPORT DEPARTMENT DETECTS WIDESPREAD SCAM OF 'FLYING' LICENCE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/05/road-transport-department-detects-widespread-scam-of-flying-licence/53537

    02/05/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    “Actually this is not an issue of a ‘flying licence’, the real issue is forgery

    The licence is not a legitimate one

    It is an offence committed by scammers whereby this ‘licence’ has no record nor does it exist in the JPJ system

    “If a driver obtains a licence by this means, he or she doesn’t actually own a valid licence and needs to remember that it is fake,” he said

    “The modus operandi of these scammers is to offer advertisements on social media saying that the document is a valid licence when in fact, it is not valid

    “What the public needs to remember is that any holder of this fake licence can only use it for a short time before this forgery is detected when the driver tries to renew the driving licence the following year,” he said

    ['jpj', 'fake', 'drive', 'licence', 'say']

    “The police cannot use any excuse, especially inappropriate excuses, to prevent any party from making a police report,” he said

    “Suaram disagrees with the statement made by Inspector-General of Police Tan Sri Acryl Sani that the relaxation of dress code in police stations is only allowed in emergencies and is limited to ‘life and death’ situations

    “This issue should not exist because the responsibility of the police is to accept every report made by any party unconditionally including those who want to make a police report but their application does not meet the criteria,” he added

  • HOW MUCH MONEY DO I NEED TO LIVE ENTIRELY OFF DIVIDENDS? HERE'S HOW TO FIGURE OUT THE LOWEST AMOUNT YOU NEED TO MAKE IT WORK

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/much-money-live-entirely-off-150000439.html

    82.86% Shortened!

    And so much depends on the kind of life you plan to lead in retirement

    Why does this matter? If you consider wealth relative, you’ll want to generate more money in passive income, or just enough, compared to others in your age group

    With forecasting how much dividend income you can safely expect, historical numbers provide a reliable barometer

    Close the gap with whatever retirement income you already have and if the number is lower than that $100,000 — say, just $10,000 — you’ll be in better shape to experience dividend-derived freedom

    Since 2018, the fund’s median dividend yield has been 2.97%

    That means you’d need just $3,367,003 to generate $100,000 in passive income annually

    ['dividend', 'much', 'retirement', 'passive', 'income']

  • HOW CAN I AVOID PAYING TAXES ON IRA WITHDRAWALS?

    https://finance.yahoo.com//news/avoid-paying-taxes-ira-withdrawals-202808379.html

    88.24% Shortened!

    Roth IRA and Traditional IRA If you are planning your retirement and you find yourself asking, “How can I avoid paying taxes on my IRA withdrawal when I retire?” plan ahead and open a Roth IRA instead of a traditional IRA

    A Roth IRA, however, is funded with after-tax dollars

    If you have a traditional IRA, funded by pre-tax dollars, and a Roth IRA, funded by after-tax dollars, you may have a winning tax strategy

    Then, you can use what you deposited into your Roth IRA as access to have tax-free income in retirement

    Roth IRA Conversion A Roth IRA conversion is the process of converting your traditional IRA account to a Roth IRA account

    If you expect your tax bracket to be higher in retirement than it is now, it may make sense to convert your traditional IRA to a Roth IRA

    ['tax', 'retirement', 'advisor', 'pay', 'ira']

    Roth IRA and Traditional IRA If you are planning your retirement and you find yourself asking, “How can I avoid paying taxes on my IRA withdrawal when I retire?” plan ahead and open a Roth IRA instead of a traditional IRA

    A Roth IRA, however, is funded with after-tax dollars

    If you have a traditional IRA, funded by pre-tax dollars, and a Roth IRA, funded by after-tax dollars, you may have a winning tax strategy

    Then, you can use what you deposited into your Roth IRA as access to have tax-free income in retirement

    Roth IRA Conversion A Roth IRA conversion is the process of converting your traditional IRA account to a Roth IRA account

    If you expect your tax bracket to be higher in retirement than it is now, it may make sense to convert your traditional IRA to a Roth IRA

    ['tax', 'retirement', 'advisor', 'pay', 'ira']

    Last summer, Bank of America boosted its quarterly dividend by 5% to 22 cents per share — and that’s after the company’s 17% dividend increase in July 2021

    At the current share price, the bank offers an annual yield of 2.5%

    Buffett likes the company, too, as Bank of America happens to be the second-largest holding at Berkshire Hathaway

    In Q3 of 2022, the Chinese tech company grew its revenue by 3% from a year ago to $29.1 billion

    16, 2022, the company has repurchased approximately $18 billion of its own shares under its existing $25 billion share repurchase program

    ['stock', 'munger', 'year', 'share', 'bank']

    When interest rates increase, the spread of a bank’s earnings widens

    Last summer, Bank of America boosted its quarterly dividend by 5% to 22 cents per share — and that’s after the company’s 17% dividend increase in July 2021

    At the current share price, the bank offers an annual yield of 2.5%

    Buffett likes the company, too, as Bank of America happens to be the second-largest holding at Berkshire Hathaway

    In Q3 of 2022, the Chinese tech company grew its revenue by 3% from a year ago to $29.1 billion

    16, 2022, the company has repurchased approximately $18 billion of its own shares under its existing $25 billion share repurchase program

  • HAPPY THAIPUSAM, SAYS RELIGIOUS AFFAIRS MINISTER WHILE REMINDING MUSLIMS NOT TO PARTICIPATE IN THE CEREMONIAL RITUALS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/04/happy-thaipusam-says-religious-affairs-minister-while-reminding-muslims-not-to-participate-in-the-ceremonial-rituals

    02/05/2023, 00:05

    57.14% Shortened!

    Saturday, 04 Feb 2023

    The Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Religious Affairs) said Thaipusam involves rituals performed in religious houses of worship and the advice was based on the guidelines by the Federal Territory Mufti Associate Prof Datuk Dr Luqman Haji Abdullah

    “Since Thaipusam is a religious worship event specific to its followers, Muslims are advised not to get involved or participate in non-Muslim religious worship ceremonies,” he said in a statement Saturday (Feb 4)

    Meanwhile, the mufti, in a statement, said while Islam promotes good relationships regardless of religion, the faith also puts a limit when it comes to religious rituals

    “With this principle, Muslims are prohibited from participating in any non-Islamic religious celebration rituals because it is against the principles of Islamic faith

    Minister in the Prime Minister’s Department (Religious Affairs)

    ['thaipusam', 'non', 'muslim', 'participate', 'ritual']

  • HINDU DEVOTEES, FOREIGN TOURISTS THRONG PENANG TO CELEBRATE THAIPUSAM

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/04/hindu-devotees-foreign-tourists-throng-penang-to-celebrate-thaipusam

    02/04/2023, 23:05

    53.85% Shortened!

    Sivarataman, 42, arrived here with his wife and two children from Langkawi, Kedah to celebrate Thaipusam with some of his family members from Kelantan

    "We are looking forward to celebrating Thaipusam this year and had booked our flight tickets here in December,” he told Bernama today

    He arrived in the state this morning then proceeded to take part in the golden chariot procession and broke coconuts to pay his vows

    "The state government would like to invite all parties to take advantage of the Thaipusam celebrations by reaffirming our determination to improve and strengthen the spirit of unity for the continued progress and development of the state," he said during a walkabout at Jalan Kebun Bunga, here

    Together with Penang police chief Datuk Mohd Shuhaily Mohd Zain, they conducted a motorcycle patrol around the city to monitor the procession of the golden and silver chariots

    The golden chariot procession began at 6am today from Lebuh Queen towards the Thanneermalai Shree Balathandayuthapani Devasthanam Temple and is expected to arrive by midnight, while the silver chariot procession began at 7am from the Nagarathar Kovil Vidu Temple, Lebuh Penang and is expected to reach the grounds of the Waterfall Temple by 1am or 2am

    ['celebrate', 'thaipusam', 'devotee', 'penang', 'procession']

    About 58% expect they’ll have to keep working longer, while 36% worry that retirement may not even be an option

    Before you think about bolstering your retirement savings, you’ll want to get any debt cleared

    As for those saving on their own, you might consider setting up an automatic monthly transfer to keep you accountable

    Even if it’s a small amount, when it comes to saving for retirement, slow and steady wins the race

    If you’re closer to retirement age, it might be safer to stay conservative

    02/04/2023

    75.0% Shortened!

    A customer found mould on food served by the coffee chain ZUS Coffee while dining at the KL East Mall outlet

    The customer then alerted the staff, who compensated the customer with vouchers and removed all the hot dogs from the shelf

    The customer also reminded everyone to be careful and alert about the condition of their food before consuming it

    ZUS Coffee has reached out to the customer to offer a full refund and medical compensation

    ZUS Coffee said they have reached out to the customer and are awaiting a reply

    They will fully refund the food order, provide the recommendation of a medical panel, and compensation for medical treatments needed to ensure the customer’s health and safety

  • THINK TANK WARNS PUTRAJAYA OF A SICKER MALAYSIA IF HEALTHCARE BUDGET CUT THIS YEAR

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/04/think-tank-warns-putrajaya-of-a-sicker-malaysia-if-healthcare-budget-cut-this-year/53382

    02/04/2023

    53.85% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 4 — The federal government should maintain if not increase its spending on public healthcare when it retables Budget 2023 in Parliament in the next few weeks, the Galen Centre for Health and Social Policy said today

    Its CEO Azrul Mohd Khalib warned that any cuts to public healthcare would lead to a collapse of the entire system that has been buckling under the strain of the Covid-19 pandemic the last few years even as he expressed alarm at the recent news reports of burnout among the country’s shrinking medical workforce

    Azrul’s warning comes ahead of the Anwar administration’s plan to retable a revision to the Budget in Parliament on February 24, to reflect the country’s national debt and liabilities currently amounting to RM1.5 trillion

    Budget 2023 had been tabled last October by the previous government then led by Datuk Seri Ismail Sabri Yaakob but was not debated on or passed, due to the dissolution of Parliament that paved the way for the 15th general election last November

    Several ministers have been reported expecting a leaner Budget with the global economic headwinds this year post pandemic

    Defence Minister Datuk Seri Mohamad Hasan has said that he has submitted a new recalibrated Budget to the Finance Ministry — helmed by Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim

    ['healthcare', 'budget', 'parliament', 'health', 'say']

  • INDIAN NATIONAL'S WIFE AMONG FIVE ARRESTED OVER HIS MURDER

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/04/indian-nationals-wife-among-five-arrested-over-his-murder/53394

    02/04/2023, 17:05

    45.45% Shortened!

    Subang Jaya police chief ACP Wan Azlan Wan Mamat said the suspects, aged between 25 and 35, were two local women, an Indonesian woman and a woman from India as well as a male Indian national

    His confession was made in Ampang Jaya

    "Following the confession, police from the Ampang Jaya IPD (district police headquarters) detained the suspect as well as a female Indian national who is the wife of the victim

    "As a result of investigations, the suspect led police to the location of the murder as well as to where the body was buried," he said in a statement here today

    Wan Azlan said the investigation found that the motive for the murder was over the suspect having an affair with the victim's wife

    Police are continuing with the investigation to locate the murder weapon in this case," he added

  • KAMPAR MP TELLS MACC, EC TO ALSO INVESTIGATE PAS, GERAKAN FOR SPENDING BIG IN GE15

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/malaysia/2023/02/04/kampar-mp-tells-macc-ec-to-also-investigate-pas-gerakan-for-spending-big-in-ge15/53389

    02/04/2023, 16:05

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 4 — A DAP federal lawmaker today called on the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) and the Election Commission (EC) to investigate Bersatu’s partners in the Perikatan Nasional (PN) coalition for possible fund abuses during last year’s contentious general election

    Kampar MP Chong Zhemin said that since the anti-graft watchdog had frozen Bersatu’s bank accounts, it should also look into the accounts of both PAS and Gerakan to check the source of its campaign funds for GE15 last November

    “Where did Perikatan Nasional receive such a huge amount of money to use in the election campaign?” Chong asked

    He cited Article 19(1)(a) of the Election Offences Act 1954 which restricts the spending of each election candidate to RM200,000 maximum for parliamentary seats, and RM100,000 for state seats

    “I urge the Election Commission (EC) to also investigate whether the expenditures of PN candidates in the general election have exceeded the legal limit,” added Chong who is also Perak DAP publicity secretary

    Last Wedneday, MACC confirmed that it had suspended Bersatu’s bank accounts to facilitate investigations under the Anti-Money Laundering, Anti-Terrorism Financing and Proceeds of Unlawful Activities Act 2001 that began last December

    ['anti', 'macc', 'election', 'bersatu', 'last']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 4 — A DAP federal lawmaker today called on the Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) and the Election Commission (EC) to investigate Bersatu’s partners in the Perikatan Nasional (PN) coalition for possible fund abuses during last year’s contentious general election

    Kampar MP Chong Zhemin said that since the anti-graft watchdog had frozen Bersatu’s bank accounts, it should also look into the accounts of both PAS and Gerakan to check the source of its campaign funds for GE15 last November

    He cited Article 19(1)(a) of the Election Offences Act 1954 which restricts the spending of each election candidate to RM200,000 maximum for parliamentary seats, and RM100,000 for state seats

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 4 — Over 300,000 visitors are expected to throng Batu Caves in conjunction with the Thaipusam celebration, starting this evening until tomorrow

    Acting Selangor police chief Datuk S

    “So far, the situation in Batu Caves is under control despite traffic congestion in the area,” he told a press conference after checking on the preparations for the Thaipusam festival today

    Meanwhile, he said some 1,888 police personnel would be deployed to ensure that the Thaipusam celebration in Batu Caves goes on smoothly

    Meanwhile, Kuala Lumpur police chief Datuk Azmi Abu Kassim, in a statement today said a total of 682 police officers and personnel had been deployed to facilitate the chariot procession from the Sri Maha Mariammam temple at Jalan Tun HS Lee to the Subramaniam temple in Batu Caves

    He also urged those with information on any criminal activity to contact the Kuala Lumpur police hotline at 03-2115 9999 or any nearest police station

    ['batu', 'cave', 'police', 'say', 'jalan']

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 4 — Over 300,000 visitors are expected to throng Batu Caves in conjunction with the Thaipusam celebration, starting this evening until tomorrow

    Acting Selangor police chief Datuk S

    “So far, the situation in Batu Caves is under control despite traffic congestion in the area,” he told a press conference after checking on the preparations for the Thaipusam festival today

    Meanwhile, he said some 1,888 police personnel would be deployed to ensure that the Thaipusam celebration in Batu Caves goes on smoothly

    Meanwhile, Kuala Lumpur police chief Datuk Azmi Abu Kassim, in a statement today said a total of 682 police officers and personnel had been deployed to facilitate the chariot procession from the Sri Maha Mariammam temple at Jalan Tun HS Lee to the Subramaniam temple in Batu Caves

    He also urged those with information on any criminal activity to contact the Kuala Lumpur police hotline at 03-2115 9999 or any nearest police station

    ['batu', 'cave', 'police', 'say', 'jalan']



  • CUSTOMER FINDS MOULD ON ZUS COFFEE'S SAUSAGE ROLL, COMPANY APOLOGISES | TRP

    02/04/2023

    75.0% Shortened!

    A customer found mould on food served by the coffee chain ZUS Coffee while dining at the KL East Mall outlet

    The customer then alerted the staff, who compensated the customer with vouchers and removed all the hot dogs from the shelf

    The customer also reminded everyone to be careful and alert about the condition of their food before consuming it

    ZUS Coffee has reached out to the customer to offer a full refund and medical compensation

    ZUS Coffee said they have reached out to the customer and are awaiting a reply

    They will fully refund the food order, provide the recommendation of a medical panel, and compensation for medical treatments needed to ensure the customer’s health and safety

    ['zu', 'coffee', 'customer', 'food', 'incident']

    "All highway users heading south (from Ipoh to Kuala Lumpur) are strongly advised to plan their journey via the PLUS App to check the traffic conditions," it said

  • CHINA'S MEGA-RICH MOVE THEIR WEALTH, AND PARTYING, TO SINGAPORE

    https://www.malaymail.com/news/singapore/2023/02/04/chinas-mega-rich-move-their-wealth-and-partying-to-singapore/53353

    02/04/2023, 11:07

    77.78% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise SINGAPORE, Feb 4 ― Singapore is seeing an influx of ultra-wealthy families from China looking to protect their wealth from a Communist Party that increasingly views them with suspicion

    'My money is mine' Relocating to Singapore puts the wealth of China's richest beyond the reach of Beijing, whose recent high-profile crackdowns have rattled billionaires

    “Moving to Singapore is about making sure the family wealth is kept safe and can last for several generations,” the accountant said

    Loh Kia Meng, co-head of private wealth and family office practices at law firm Dentons Rodyk, estimated that 1,500 family offices would have been set up by the end of last year

    Singapore is a “very handy neutral zone” where the mega-rich can do business, said Song Seng Wun, a regional economist with CIMB Private Banking

    “If the world's rich are congregating in Singapore, why not me? ― AFP

    ['singapore', 'family', 'china', 'chinese', 'say']

    02/04/2023, 10:08

    50.0% Shortened!

    About Us Advertise KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 4 — Anyone going to a police station should keep the fifth principle of the Rukun Negara in mind and dress courteously and mind their morals, Inspector-General of Police Tan Sri Acryl Sani Abdullah Sani said today after an incident where a woman was reportedly barred entry over the length of her trousers

    “In an emergency, we can relax the directive

    We have to see what kind of emergency it is

    He said police stations fell under the category of government offices, adding that the Chief Secretary to the Government had made clear the types of clothes that can and cannot be worn in a directive

    Earlier this week, news portal Free Malaysia Today reported a woman complaining that she had been denied entry into a Selangor district police station over the length of her trousers

    The woman whom the news portal identified only as “Karen” was said to have gone to the Kajang police station to report on her car collision with a truck, only to be told by a policeman that she could not enter as her trousers were above her knees

    People who have to travel for business usually look for the most direct route or shortest flight times, while people who are on vacation can afford to spend more time on transit, for example

    But instead of being happy about this, his wife will ask, “Why can’t you pre-plan our family vacations?” Liu says he always tries his best to plan for the family holiday, but there are times when he just can’t get out of a work commitment

    Major airline companies, especially, still do offer savings for early ticket purchases – and when I say early, I mean months in advance

    At the same time, hotels and resorts also offer early bird discounts for travellers

    In short, if you plan your trip early, you are bound to enjoy substantial savings

    However, many wage earners find it hard to plan their trips well ahead of time these days because of work commitments

  • EMBRACING INTER-FAITH VALUES

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/04/embracing-inter-faith-values

    02/04/2023, 08:09

    76.92% Shortened!

    Sultan Ibrahim Ibni Almarhum Sultan Iskandar said the fatwa issued by the Johor Islamic Religious Council (MAINJ) on Thursday is in no way in conflict with the inter-faith values of tolerance, unity and understanding as espoused under the Bangsa Johor concept

    Tomorrow, Sultan Ibrahim will be at Arulmigu Sri Balasubramaniar temple in Skudai here to attend the state-level Thaipusam celebration

    The last time the Johor Ruler did so was in 2019 at the Arulmigu Thendayuthapani temple in Wadi Hana here

    Sri Balasubramaniar temple chairman Datuk S

    On Thursday, State Islamic Religious Affairs Committee chairman Mohd Fared Mohd Khalid said Muslims in Johor are allowed to attend celebrations held by people of other faiths, but they should not take part in their religious rituals

    “In this context, organisers of non-Muslim celebrations should be sensitive and ensure the sensitivity of Muslims is respected in line with Islam’s position as the federal religion and the official religion of Johor,” he had said at a press conference pertaining to the fatwa.

    ['johor', 'attend', 'celebration', 'religious', 'say']

    Sultan Ibrahim Ibni Almarhum Sultan Iskandar said the fatwa issued by the Johor Islamic Religious Council (MAINJ) on Thursday is in no way in conflict with the inter-faith values of tolerance, unity and understanding as espoused under the Bangsa Johor concept

    The last time the Johor Ruler did so was in 2019 at the Arulmigu Thendayuthapani temple in Wadi Hana here

    Sri Balasubramaniar temple chairman Datuk S

    On Thursday, State Islamic Religious Affairs Committee chairman Mohd Fared Mohd Khalid said Muslims in Johor are allowed to attend celebrations held by people of other faiths, but they should not take part in their religious rituals

    “In this context, organisers of non-Muslim celebrations should be sensitive and ensure the sensitivity of Muslims is respected in line with Islam’s position as the federal religion and the official religion of Johor,” he had said at a press conference pertaining to the fatwa.

  • HOME MINISTRY TASKED WITH LICENSING RULES FOR FIREWORKS

    https://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2023/02/04/home-ministry-tasked-with-licensing-rules

    02/04/2023, 08:07

    79.31% Shortened!

    The Finance Ministry would be involved in determining the duties to be imposed on these items, said Local Government Development Minister Nga Kor Ming

    He said legalising firecrackers and fireworks would not only ensure the safety of the goods for public use but would also be a source of revenue for the government

    Nga had earlier announced that the Cabinet’s decision to legalise firecrackers and fireworks would bring benefits to the country

    Nga was also quoted as saying that all imported firecrackers and fireworks would require the approval and verification of the relevant authorities

    Nga said food and beverage outlets located under the municipal council’s jurisdiction had until 2025 to ensure their toilets receive an “A” certification, while outlets under the district council’s jurisdiction would have until 2026

    02/04/2023, 08:07

    85.0% Shortened!

    All police personnel must understand the Constitution

    Now when the dress code issue was brought to public attention, he is keeping quiet

    In this day and age, the police system should be linked in every station, so that we do not have to run around from one police station to another to make reports

    But a police station is a public establishment supported by taxpayers’ money

    We should not be telling people how to dress

    Are there too many of them now? They should be curtly reprimanded and told to focus on their police work

    ['dress', 'code', 'police', 'station', 'home']

    02/04/2023, 08:05

    He said they would use the rotation system in fielding players, especially in singles where apart from Zii Jia, a second player, Leong Jun Hao, had also been selected to represent the country

    As Zii Jia and Jun Hao have not been performing well lately, Choong Hann wants to use the centralised training camp next week to whip them into top shape, especially in terms of shuttle control and tactics

    Zii Jia had a disappointing start to 2023 when he crashed out in the early rounds of the Malaysian Open, India Open and Indonesian Masters while Jun Hao suffered a similar fate in the qualifying round of the Thailand Masters, losing 22-24, 19-21 to teammate Yeoh Seong Zoe

    At the Asia Mixed Team Championships, Malaysia will also be relying on world men’s doubles champions Aaron Chia-Soh Wooi Yik, top women’s doubles pair Pearly Tan-M

    Asked about India, who are considered Malaysia’s main threat in Group B, Choong Hann believed his team could win if they managed to handle the pressure on court
